tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We had our 3rd baby delivered with the help of Dr Sapna. Honestly, we cant thank her enough for the professionalism that she has shown. From the beginning she has been a great advisor and till the end. Delivery happened at Aster CMI hospitals and her entire team was very focussed and helpful. Dr Sheetal, Dr Alkeen, Dr Harshini.. special thanks to you all. The nursing staff Saloni, Shivashakti and Mamata were all some good people in the life to remember.. thank you everyone..  For anyone, personally me and my wife would recommend Dr Sapna at any time.
The Sapna Health Care Clinic is also very convenient to reach, but parking is a problem. You will be greeted pleasantly by Dr Shipra or Dr Mayuri. Please keep some buffer time to be able meet the best gynaec Dr Sapna.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
With great sense of satisfaction, I am writing this testimony for Dr. Sapna Lulla as it should be useful for those who are unable to decide the right doctor for their Pregnancy Consultation
In-fact we met this doctor by reading honest reviews about her.

Dr Sapna is a dynamic ,experienced, very friendly, positive and full of energy as a person.
Her knowledge in her domain, complemented with her attention for details and kind nature definitely makes her the best doctor
The most busy doctor who never leaves her smile behind even though she works 24/7 for her patients.

Being first pregnancy, we had umpteen doubts to be clarified and she was there patiently clearing them all , gave us a stress free relationship with her during consultations . She is always available to clarify any doubts via watsapp and answers calls even in her busy schedule.
What we liked the most was her emphasis on natural process, recommends natural remedies rather than going for various procedures.
She doesn't scare you unnecessarily during your pregnancy phase , have lot of things / scenario to pen down.

Due to less pain tolerance and my short height everyone including me had an impression that I cannot withstand normal delivery. 
But she put in all the efforts to make this delivery of mine normal. Her support , guidance and encouragement during labor was impeccable.
She waited till last moment and insisted on normal delivery though we gave up on our hope. 
I never knew that someone would fill that confidence in me which I never had, her smile and positivity will boost the confidence in anyone. 
I will always be obliged to Dr. Sapna, for this as I could not have achieved without her moral support.

She gave me a different perspective of a doctor as most of them scare us with myths and unnecessary complications though we are healthy. 
She just insisted to do Pelvic/Kegel exercises ,Squats, walking and sweeping/mopping floor in-order to stay active and healthy.  
Not much medication she always sticks to natural food supplements. 

Advice to Mom-to-be : If you want to give you and your baby a POSITIVE WOMB EXPERIENCE , blindly go consult Dr. Sapna Lulla without a second thought.Exceptional professionalism, personal care and guidance proves her very special and effective..Doctors like Sapna are truly rare.

I thoroughly enjoyed my entire pregnancy journey with her and felt so blessed to hold my lil beautiful angel (Normal Delivery) on April 28th in Cloud nine HRBR Layout Branch . God bless her with good health to continue her impeccable service . 

Our heartfelt thanks for your care and love . Bangalore deserves more doctors like you Ma'am. A Big Thank you :) 

With Love ,
Alam & Jyothish and Baby - April Rose :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We are very happy to share our experience with Dr. Sapna for others to benefit. *** ** ********* ************** she doesn't recommend any un-necessary tests and she makes it a point to share her diagnosis/findings clearly with patients. She is easily approachable and she also takes the needed time to update the next steps which gives us a clear sense of direction. She answered all our queries and questions patiently throughout pregnancy and she was also available to clarify any follow-up questions via whatsapp. 

Unlike many other doctors who rush through the conception process, she allows the body to naturally conceive and intervenes only if warranted. Same is the case with delivering the baby where she tunes in patients during early pregnancy cycle for normal delivery. We have personally experienced this with her and it is very rare to find a doctor who cares more about side effects and we have never seen her drug me with any unnecessary medication. She is always energetic and cheerful and I have never been so excited in my entire life for doctor visits :D In this generation, pregnancy is being looked at like a 'disease' where everyone gets so petrified and over-cautious but time and again, doctor has re-iterated that this is a physiological phenomenon through her actions - be it with squats, climbing stairs, sweeping, mopping and so on. Because of this attitude, I never missed to do anything during my pregnancy. It was indeed made a very pleasant experience and I thoroughly cherished every bit of it and I owe that to the doctor _/\_ _/\_ Infact I should say that mopping and squats that she recommended did play a key role in helping me deliver vaginally (note; I have never mopped in my entire life :P) Also, I would never forget that the doc even permitted me to walk 50k during my pregnancy :) when everyone was against it. I find the doctor very encouraging and due to which I confidently worked till the last day. She has been always available and she told us not to hesitate to call her anytime even in the nights  in case of emergency and she told that she doesn't sleep :( - we have seen her always at the hospital - hope she gets enough time with her family. 

On the day I got admitted for my delivery, I told the nurse to fix IV slowly as I have never done that before. I was completely scared about the entire labor process. In the labor room, I was in tremendous pain and I was clueless how everything will progress. She just swiftly came in within minutes and she was a huge pillar of strength and the moment I saw her, I knew I was in safe hands. She allowed my husband to be next to me. I held her hand and told that there was lotttt of pain. She talked very positively and gave me encouraging words and told that I was doing well (GOK if that was true) but those motivating words did indeed help and I delivered normally in next 15-20 minutes. We strongly believe that this wouldn't have been possible with out Dr. Sapna and we are indebted for life. We strongly recommend her for gynaecology/conception/pregnancy and delivery *** *** ** ****** *** ********* **

tags: None
review:
Review

I started to consult Dr.  Sapna lulla at Ovum hospital during my 4th month of pregnancy, after reading many good online reviews about Dr. Sapna.i had earlier consulted 2 other gynaecs but felt that they lacked the personal touch that I required.  I was on the lookout for a Doctor Who was confident about her decisions and also showed personal interest in me... This is when I met Dr.  Sapna and deciding to continue with her at Ovum hospital was the best decision that my husband and me could take.  From the first consultation onwards,  Dr. Sapna showed a lot of concern and interest in my case as I had developed diabetes.  This did not seem to worry her,  instead she instilled confidence in me from the first day that I could have a healthy n normal pregnancy and could also have a normal delivery.  Dr.  Sapna's sense of confidence in any given situation is the best part about consulting her..  She is a highly skilled,  energetic,  enthusiastic and positive person and she gives a lot of positive energy to the mother to be !
Under Dr. Sapna's guidance,  I was able to maintain a healthy pregnancy ... She is always available and accessible, she had asked me to call her at any point of time during the day or at night if I faced any issues...another great quality of Dr Sapna is that she always recommends natural remedies to normal pregnancy related problems. 
I would confidently state that meeting Dr Sapna was a blessing and she alone was responsible for me to deliver my baby normally without any issues...  She always insists on Going in for a normal delivery and prepares the patient on the same lines from the first consultation. 
I would like to thank Dr. Sapna for being there for me and giving me such a warm and friendly feeling,  I would highly recommend Dr Sapna to any mother to be.  I believe that consulting a genuine and good doctor is the best gift that one can give themselves during the crucial period of pregnancy,  and Dr Sapna is one such genuine and friendly Doctor Who can help you do away with all your pregnancy woes.  
Also a big thank you to all the staff at Ovum hospital,  it's one of the hospitals where you do not feel unnecessarily nervous or tensed being part of a hospital environment..  The nurses always welcome you with a warm and friendly smile and the hospital staff are generally very courteous and helpful.  They give you a personal touch.  I'd like to specially thank Sr. Blessy, Sr. Sally,  Sr. Mamata all of whom have been extremely warm and friendly and have treated me very well.  
Overall,  we have had a great time consulting at Ovum.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
***** **** *** **** * ***** *** **** ** ****** ******* *** **** ** **** ** **** *** **** ******* We are not from banglore and are not aware of good gynic around. We found one and visited her till 34th week of my pregnancy. I am a healthy person in all means and there were no complients till 34th week. The least thing we want is to leave an unnecessary cut on my body. I am basically a scared women who even is  scared of injection , But , my doctor was always inclined towards c section. 

I dont know what 34th week pregnant women will have in her mind but my mind was always busy
Thinking about the unwanted cut on my body . If there is really a need i understand and would go further.Me and my family ,we spent many confused nights and thought of changing the doctor. Finally we wanted a 2nd opinion and went forward and consulted Dr.spana lulla after many suggestionsand discussions 

Dr.spana lulla , i never knew that someone would fill that confidence in you which u never had. She is  really a dynamic person and explains everything in detail.Even a layman can understand what she says and the best part is she tells what is done to your body which many doctors lack.The most busy doctor who never leaves her smile behind even though she works 24/7 for her patients. The surprising thing is i visited her in 35th for the first time and she dint ask us a single question on why did we changed the doctor in same hospital.

Me and my husband were totally confused and rehearsed on what to talk to doctor the next morning. But the situation became a cake walk because of her. There is no room for unwanted wheres and whys we were accepted as if i am her patient from the start.

I delivered my baby boy on Feb 25th 
As per our dream to deliver normal and which is never possible without this wonder women. She made a sensitive girl like me to do it. I never thought i can do it. I had to deliver my boy in 37th week as i had blood spotting and was asked to come to hospital immediately. There onwards she asked me to do all the excercises for the normal delivary. Actually on the same day of my delivery she need to fly to deliver one of her relatives. But she never rushed or handed me over to any other doctor. She is very patient and never left me unattended.  She kept monitoring every now and then. At the nth moment as i couldnt push, she helped me to push. I know i irritated her a lot as all i could hear in my hear is " push navya push" but i couldn't. I really saw how worried she is when iam not pushing. Even though pain is mine she took entire pressure. I trusted her completely to my life. She brought my tiny naturally without using any instrument.We were
 really moved on hearing when she told my family the reason why she did not prefer using instruments. She told if it is a girl and has a scar on her face she will have to deal with it lifetime. I am very lucky that i have changed my opinion in the nth moment. I never saw such a dedicated doctor. She is the miracle which happend to me.

Today iam very healthy and could look after my tiny without any assistance.

Thank you Dr.Sapna. I love u and owe you.

tags: None
review:
Before I write anything, let me tell you that we had a baby boy delivered 1 month 10 days before the expected delivery date. In medical terms, they call it a pre term delivery or pre mature baby.  Of course. no magic happened and my baby had respiratory problems and was kept in NICU for two days. He recovered completely and is doing great now. I hate to use the term " pre mature" as he is very active and healthy.

Now I would like you to know, that my wife had a normal delivery and I had an extremely amazing experience at Ovum hospital with Dr. Sapna Lulla. 
We started following up with Dr. Sapna starting from the day 1 after the positive pregnancy test. The pregnancy period was not so easy for us. She had a blod clot which was detected in 2nd month of pregnancy. Dr. Sapna took excellent care of my wife, she put her on progestrone and advised to take bed rest. Fortunately, my wife recovered and the baby was completely fine.

Later on, while the 7th month was about to end, due to shortened cervix, we got to know that there was a risk of early delivery. Dr. Sapna advised my wife to just take rest and not stress. While, during this phase, we were just counting and passing days.
Finally on 11th evening, when we met Dr. Sapna, she diagnosed and asked my wife to get admitted for observation. We were little reluctant as my wife was doing completely fine at this time. However, we completed the formalities of admission and at 9 pm, I went out to grab some food for us. Suddenly, I got a call from my wife that she is having a lot of pain and asked me to return immediately. I reached hospital within 5 minutes, met Dr. Sapna and our baby was delivered at 11 pm.

Dr. Sapna, stressed me that she is going to carry out a normal delivery. I was little concerned but I trusted her. She explained me about each and every circumstances and told me not to worry as everything would  be fine. Eventually, every thing was fine. 
I would like to appreciate Dr. Sapna and thank her from the bottom of my heart for whatever she did to keep the baby and Mom healthy. At each point in time, she kept us well informed. Her stress on normal delivery, even for a pre term, went so well. She is a kind of doctor, who never bothered about of how much money she or the hospital  is going to make, rather took care of my wife's and baby's health.

Moreover, the facilities at OVUM were excellent, especially the NICU. I would strongly recommend and advise to consult her during pregnancy.

Thank you Ovum and Dr. Sapna(You are awesome).

Proud Parents! - Anshuman Mishra & Shilpi Mishra.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
All nurses were very supportive and helped with all our queries. 
Doctor sapna lulla was very friendly with us and treated us very well.

tags: None
review:
We, my wife (Keerthi P) and I, were introduced to Dr. Sapna Lulla, by my brother-in-law, Dr. Rajeev Pullagura, who was then a surgeon at Specialist Hospital. 
This was my wife's second pregnancy. I would not say that her pregnancies are complicated, but there were hiccups for sure. This time, our entire consultation was with Dr. Sapna. 
She is a very patient person, reads your entire history and always tries to suggest natural remedial measures than putting you on high end medicines. 
My wife had a fall during her 4th month and she had a spot of retro placental bleed, add to it, the baby's weight was less to start with. With suggestions from Dr. Sapna we did sail through this phase smoothly. 
My first child was a normal delivery and hoped the same for the second one as well. However, this time around, we had a couple of things in the last trimester, which concerned the doctor if a normal delivery was indeed possible this time. Also, at 33 weeks, the baby was in breech position. 
With the baby's head circumference being large, it added to the worry if she would deliver normal. 
However, Dr. Sapna motivated us a lot towards the last few weeks so that we could have a normal birth this time. Based on her suggestions, which we trusted the most, labour was induced during 38 weeks 4 days. 
During the labour the baby's heart beat was hitting a high and the baby was mobile. Even though my wife gave up during the labour and told the doctor to do a c-section, Dr. stood steady,  supported & motivated her to go for normal delivery. Personally, we have never seen doctor's being so involved in labour. With Dr. Sapna, my experience was very different, she was there for every second of 3-4 hours of labour, monitoring the baby's heartbeat. With the support of Dr. Sapna and her team, we did deliver a healthy, beautiful baby boy weighing 3.8 kgs by normal delivery procedure. I will always be obliged to Dr. Sapna, for this. Now a days, where c-section has become a norm, Dr. Sapna and her team had put in all the efforts to make this delivery of mine normal. Dr. is also very friendly, peppy, positive and full of energy as a person. She is my elder daughter's best friend. Dr. Sapna, will remain the gynecologist we go to for this life, she is the one who has proved to us tht doctor's are next to God. Thank you Doctor, for making my family complete.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
*** ** *** **** ************ ** ********* *******
As we planned our second baby in Bangalore, I was a bit cautious while choosing Gynecologist. I got very good feedback about Doctor Sapna from two of my very close friends who were treated by Sapna Ma’am during their pregnancies in 2016. I found equally good reviews on internet as well. So I decided to go with Dr Sapna for my pregnancy treatment. During my initial few consultation appointments with her; I realized that my decision to go with her was correct.
 
I found Sapna Ma’am very friendly and extremely caring. She’s a seasoned medical practitioner who’s having full confidence on her way of treatment. She knows what’s best for her patients in a given situation. Rather she’s so friendly that she’ll never let you feel that you’re a patient. She’s very flexible and will not prescribe diagnostic tests and medicines un-necessarily and will always encourage you to live your normal life as much as possible rather than taking too many precautions. She’s always approachable and ready to give you right advice even during late night or early morning.

My delivery experience was also equally calm and relaxed. My first baby was born at Gurgaon - my native place and I was extremely tensed and nervous by that experience which was not so good. 
Sapna Ma’am not only gave me enough confidence by assuring me and my child would 100% safe, but also made me feel at ease during the whole process. As she promised, I was totally relaxed & was smiling while entering the operation theatre and came out smiling after giving birth to a healthy baby girl. 
Sapna Ma'am was so caring & concerned that during my stay at hospital, she made sure that she’ll make a visit to all her patients once she’s done with her daily job even if it’s mid-night.

My sincere Thanks to Sapna Ma’am. *** ** *** **** ****** **** **** *** ** ** ****** I would strongly recommend to all my friends and relatives for any OBG related consultation.

tags: None
review:
Dr. Sapna was recommended by our family friend Dr.Arfath.*** ** *** **** ************** ************.My wife started consulting her from the beginning of her pregnancy.She  listens to all our concerns and explains everything patiently. She always has a smile on her face no matter the time of the day.She always has a positive attitude and motivates us to be the same.She is wonderful and encouraging and always puts us at ease.She ALWAYS stresses on normal delivery.
In the 32nd week,we came to know that our baby was in the breech position.But she never tried to scare us.She said not to worry as most of the times the baby comes back to normal position in the last few weeks.She said not to stress and only suggested some light exercises.My wife felt very safe in her hands.And as predicted by her, the baby had come back to normal position during delivery.
But during delivery there was another complication.My wife  got admitted at midnight and everything went smoothly at first.But after an hour,my wife started experiencing a lot of pain.Reason was the cord wrapped tightly around my baby's leg thus delaying the delivery.Dr.Sapna correctly guessed this was the case ( as it was midnite there was no way to take an ultrasound).She tried very hard to deliver normally.If it was some other doctor ,they would have surely carried out a C section.Though my wife gave up due to excruciating pain,Dr.Sapna never lost faith.She was continuously encouraging my wife and it was through her efforts that my wife delivered a baby boy normally.It was Dr.Sapna's constant  soothing words of encouragement which gave my wife courage in the delivery room.
Thank you so much Dr.Sapna for being with us like an angel during our difficult journey.May Allah bless you always.

review:
Before I write anything, let me tell you that we had a baby boy delivered 1 month 10 days before the expected delivery date. In medical terms, they call it a pre term delivery or pre mature baby.  Of course. no magic happened and my baby had respiratory problems and was kept in NICU for two days. He recovered completely and is doing great now. I hate to use the term " pre mature" as he is very active and healthy.

Now I would like you to know, that my wife had a normal delivery and I had an extremely amazing experience at Ovum hospital with Dr. Sapna Lulla. 
We started following up with Dr. Sapna starting from the day 1 after the positive pregnancy test. The pregnancy period was not so easy for us. She had a blod clot which was detected in 2nd month of pregnancy. Dr. Sapna took excellent care of my wife, she put her on progestrone and advised to take bed rest. Fortunately, my wife recovered and the baby was completely fine.

Later on, while the 7th month was about to end, due to shortened cervix, we got to know that there was a risk of early delivery. Dr. Sapna advised my wife to just take rest and not stress. While, during this phase, we were just counting and passing days.
Finally on 11th evening, when we met Dr. Sapna, she diagnosed and asked my wife to get admitted for observation. We were little reluctant as my wife was doing completely fine at this time. However, we completed the formalities of admission and at 9 pm, I went out to grab some food for us. Suddenly, I got a call from my wife that she is having a lot of pain and asked me to return immediately. I reached hospital within 5 minutes, met Dr. Sapna and our baby was delivered at 11 pm.

Dr. Sapna, stressed me that she is going to carry out a normal delivery. I was little concerned but I trusted her. She explained me about each and every circumstances and told me not to worry as everything would  be fine. Eventually, every thing was fine. 
I would like to appreciate Dr. Sapna and thank her from the bottom of my heart for whatever she did to keep the baby and Mom healthy. At each point in time, she kept us well informed. Her stress on normal delivery, even for a pre term, went so well. She is a kind of doctor, who never bothered about of how much money she or the hospital  is going to make, rather took care of my wife's and baby's health.

Moreover, the facilities at OVUM were excellent, especially the NICU. I would strongly recommend and advise to consult her during pregnancy.

Thank you Ovum and Dr. Sapna(You are awesome).

Proud Parents! - Anshuman Mishra & Shilpi Mishra.

tags: None
review:
We, my wife (Keerthi P) and I, were introduced to Dr. Sapna Lulla, by my brother-in-law, Dr. Rajeev Pullagura, who was then a surgeon at Specialist Hospital. 
This was my wife's second pregnancy. I would not say that her pregnancies are complicated, but there were hiccups for sure. This time, our entire consultation was with Dr. Sapna. 
She is a very patient person, reads your entire history and always tries to suggest natural remedial measures than putting you on high end medicines. 
My wife had a fall during her 4th month and she had a spot of retro placental bleed, add to it, the baby's weight was less to start with. With suggestions from Dr. Sapna we did sail through this phase smoothly. 
My first child was a normal delivery and hoped the same for the second one as well. However, this time around, we had a couple of things in the last trimester, which concerned the doctor if a normal delivery was indeed possible this time. Also, at 33 weeks, the baby was in breech position. 
With the baby's head circumference being large, it added to the worry if she would deliver normal. 
However, Dr. Sapna motivated us a lot towards the last few weeks so that we could have a normal birth this time. Based on her suggestions, which we trusted the most, labour was induced during 38 weeks 4 days. 
During the labour the baby's heart beat was hitting a high and the baby was mobile. Even though my wife gave up during the labour and told the doctor to do a c-section, Dr. stood steady,  supported & motivated her to go for normal delivery. Personally, we have never seen doctor's being so involved in labour. With Dr. Sapna, my experience was very different, she was there for every second of 3-4 hours of labour, monitoring the baby's heartbeat. With the support of Dr. Sapna and her team, we did deliver a healthy, beautiful baby boy weighing 3.8 kgs by normal delivery procedure. I will always be obliged to Dr. Sapna, for this. Now a days, where c-section has become a norm, Dr. Sapna and her team had put in all the efforts to make this delivery of mine normal. Dr. is also very friendly, peppy, positive and full of energy as a person. She is my elder daughter's best friend. Dr. Sapna, will remain the gynecologist we go to for this life, she is the one who has proved to us tht doctor's are next to God. Thank you Doctor, for making my family complete.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
*** ** *** **** ************ ** ********* *******
As we planned our second baby in Bangalore, I was a bit cautious while choosing Gynecologist. I got very good feedback about Doctor Sapna from two of my very close friends who were treated by Sapna Ma’am during their pregnancies in 2016. I found equally good reviews on internet as well. So I decided to go with Dr Sapna for my pregnancy treatment. During my initial few consultation appointments with her; I realized that my decision to go with her was correct.
 
I found Sapna Ma’am very friendly and extremely caring. She’s a seasoned medical practitioner who’s having full confidence on her way of treatment. She knows what’s best for her patients in a given situation. Rather she’s so friendly that she’ll never let you feel that you’re a patient. She’s very flexible and will not prescribe diagnostic tests and medicines un-necessarily and will always encourage you to live your normal life as much as possible rather than taking too many precautions. She’s always approachable and ready to give you right advice even during late night or early morning.

My delivery experience was also equally calm and relaxed. My first baby was born at Gurgaon - my native place and I was extremely tensed and nervous by that experience which was not so good. 
Sapna Ma’am not only gave me enough confidence by assuring me and my child would 100% safe, but also made me feel at ease during the whole process. As she promised, I was totally relaxed & was smiling while entering the operation theatre and came out smiling after giving birth to a healthy baby girl. 
Sapna Ma'am was so caring & concerned that during my stay at hospital, she made sure that she’ll make a visit to all her patients once she’s done with her daily job even if it’s mid-night.

My sincere Thanks to Sapna Ma’am. *** ** *** **** ****** **** **** *** ** ** ****** I would strongly recommend to all my friends and relatives for any OBG related consultation.

tags: None
review:
Dr. Sapna was recommended by our family friend Dr.Arfath.*** ** *** **** ************** ************.My wife started consulting her from the beginning of her pregnancy.She  listens to all our concerns and explains everything patiently. She always has a smile on her face no matter the time of the day.She always has a positive attitude and motivates us to be the same.She is wonderful and encouraging and always puts us at ease.She ALWAYS stresses on normal delivery.
In the 32nd week,we came to know that our baby was in the breech position.But she never tried to scare us.She said not to worry as most of the times the baby comes back to normal position in the last few weeks.She said not to stress and only suggested some light exercises.My wife felt very safe in her hands.And as predicted by her, the baby had come back to normal position during delivery.
But during delivery there was another complication.My wife  got admitted at midnight and everything went smoothly at first.But after an hour,my wife started experiencing a lot of pain.Reason was the cord wrapped tightly around my baby's leg thus delaying the delivery.Dr.Sapna correctly guessed this was the case ( as it was midnite there was no way to take an ultrasound).She tried very hard to deliver normally.If it was some other doctor ,they would have surely carried out a C section.Though my wife gave up due to excruciating pain,Dr.Sapna never lost faith.She was continuously encouraging my wife and it was through her efforts that my wife delivered a baby boy normally.It was Dr.Sapna's constant  soothing words of encouragement which gave my wife courage in the delivery room.
Thank you so much Dr.Sapna for being with us like an angel during our difficult journey.May Allah bless you always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Since Bangalore Traffic is a major issue now a days, we have decided to consult a good doctor near to my residence- Hoysala Nagar, Ramamurthy Nagar.
Since it was a second & twin pregnancy, after detailed search on google, we finalized to consult  Dr.Sapna Lulla. Since  Sept 2017 to DEC 2017 we consulted her at regular required visits. During initial pregnancy 10 yrs back, I had  issues with Urinary infections during 7-8 month pregnancy period. With that experience, during every  visit to doctor in 2017, we ensured to take a urinary test report voluntarily to know the status of infection & doctor recommended necessary prescription based on the Urinary Test report status. So a pro-active check was kept in this regard continuously from Sep 2017 to DEC 2017. With doctor support, guidance, necessary scanning & prescription, we managed to pull around till 34+6 weeks. Since TWIN A Was in Breech Presentation;TWIN B Was in Cephalic presentation, during this last phase, mode of delivery had to be LSCS only.
Since the average twins delivery period range is 35-37 weeks and in order to avoid more complications during this phase,  we decided to bring out the twin kids on 01.01.18 at around 2pm. As planned  two twin boys were born on 01.01.18 at around 2.56 pm & 2.57 pm respectively.
Both had to be kept at NICU due to prematurity ( 34+6weeks).
Twin-1 & Twin-2 were at NICU for 9 days & 18 days respectively due to Respiratory Distress; Sepsis; Viral Infection; Jaundice & other minor issues.
We were updated on daily basis on the status, progress made on daily basis during this tenure at Hospital. 
We are very happy on the new born kids recovery, the treatment that the kids received at NICU during the stay  & returning back to home in good health.
Overall we enjoyed the last 6 months of one time experience in life  of twin pregnancy with Dr.SAPNA LULLA, for consulting, guidance & support till Delivery.
We strongly recommend  & suggest to explore for pregnancy( Single/Twins) consultation with Dr.Sapna Lulla at Motherhood Hospital HRBR Laout Bangalore.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
*** **** ****** ***** * *** **** ** ******* *** ** *** ** **** ***** **** I came across very cretical situations thorough out my pregnancy. She saved my life. 

First 3months me and my husband kept searching and almost 6 doctors we consulted including top doc from Manipal,  finally we decided to visit Dr.Sapna Lulla ****** *** ** *** **** ****** ** ********** She is Very humble person who care for her patients genuinely , anytime she is  available on phone and she will respond. She handled complex situations of mine. 

2nd trimester
I had low placenta doctor told me to take best rest. Luckly later placenta went normal position.

3rd trimester 
I came across Early delivery chances in 7th month,  and again in 9 the month doctor  again told me to take bed rest for 2 weeks. 

Dengue fever

I'm alive today  only because of Dr.Sapna Lulla and my husband. Just before my delivery (1week) I got dengue fever trust me fever literally killed me and got admitted for 2 days I suffered 7days completely from fever. Every 6hrs fever comes and feels hell. (No medication for Dengue except water and food )I used to have 10liters of water per day.
In this situation Dr.Sapna took care of me very well and motivated me for not to worry.(like her own  kid she feed me and took for an walk)
I was completely exosted and thought I might not survive from this situation. Soon after Dengue went ( after 3days) my water broke , had C-section and blessed with baby boy. (in operation theater I was so clam because Dr.Sapna was with me and kept talking to her so that i can feel comfortable and secure). Finally I'm blessed to have doctor like her, I'm very much thankful to Dr.Sapna.

review: This is my first pregnancy & since 11th weeks of my pregnancy our entire consultation is with Dr. Sapna Lulla. She was being recommended by my colleague. Before I visited her, I was in dillema how was the doctor or whether I will be comfortable with her or not. But when my husband & I visited her I found her she listens patient history entirely & very friendly towards her each patient. She always give less medicines & which are useful but less costly & recommend homely activities i.e., sweeping, moping, walking, etc. She is very proactive, has extremely positive attitude & high confidence. I have learnt many things from her. During critical times how to keep self calm & her positive outlook is really remarkable & I have learnt these qualities from Sapna mam. My entire family is thankful to her. *** ** ****** ** ***** *** ** * ** ******* I was absolutely fine during my pre delivery period but suddenly on the delivery day, I had abruptive placenta & I was profusely bleeding. All of my family members was sure that I was going to have operation because normal delivery was very risky. My husband was mentally prepared about my operation even other medical professionals was sure that Dr. Sapna was going to do operation in this case. *** ** ***** ***** ****** ******** ****** She was very much confident & positive that she is going to do normal delivery in my case. She was with me whole night in the hospital. Her confidence boost my confidence for normal delivery. It was really critical as my placenta got ruptured but I can say Dr.Sapna is a magician or in other terms she is highly qualified professional as she turned impossible delivery happened & that too normal one. And I have delivered my baby last week. She is really normal delivery expert. I can say nowadays if I need any guidance I just approached her. She has patience & always has smile on her face. Everytime I meet her I gained positive energy. Thank you Sapna mam for everything. I would highly recommend Everyone to meet her for any kind of gyaneic related issue. Thanks is really a small word for Dr. Sapna Lulla but Amitava, my family and me (Nandini)are really thankful & grateful to u forever. Last but not least all admin & nursing staffs of Ovum hospital are really friendly & co-operative. I would really like to thank each & every staff of Ovum from bottom of my heart.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We are very happy to say that we successfully completed our pregnancy-to-delivery with the help of Dr.Sapna Lulla who is very Talented, Patience, always smiley, take care and very experienced person. * *** *********** *** **** *** ** *** ** *** **** ***** ** **** ******** *** ** ****** *** ** *** **** ****** ** **********
I and My Husband consulted Dr. Sapna Lulla at Ovum Hospitals 2 years back. By that time I was in a condition of PCOS affected and lost my pregnancy twice (One Missed abortion and one Cornual pregnancy (ectopic) where one of my fallopian tubes was tied and had scars on my uterus) 
Dr.Sapna was reviewed my case very carefully and explained us how to proceed for further. Initially she has started giving the treatment for the PCOS. But due to my ectopic surgery, I did have lot of difficulties and the chances were very less to get conceive soon. But with continuous help of Sapna maam and the suggestions she had given make us more confident and comfortable which lead to us a successful twin pregnancy.  
But still I was not happy due to one more other problem which concerned me a lot i.e. carrying twin babies. As I had Cornual ectopic surgery & considered my uterus health condition carrying twin babies will put me on more risk and chances are there to puncture the existing stitches again. The thought it self scared me a lot and made me many sleepless nights. Again Sapna maam took responsibility on this issue and supported us for every moment/difficulties we had and make us feel free throughout the pregnancy term until delivery. Now I am also one of the happiest mothers with two baby girls. 
All this happened because of Dr.Sapna and We really thankful to her for the entire support she has given for us. We do highly recommended her to others for hassle free pregnancy/delivery OR if you have any difficulties to get Conceive.

Thanks & Regards,
Sujitharam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
With great sense of satisfaction, I am writing this testimony for Dr. Sapna Lulla @ OVUM Hospital, Kalyan nagar; who has been extremely helpful and encouraging during my Sister-in-law’s (Manasa) pregnancy. She had normal delivery at Ovum Hospital on January 29th this year.


She has fantastic traits of a good doctor ; High Credentials, ********* ********* ** *** *********** Straight forward and yet empathetic to her patients. Responsive (at any point of time), and most important; almost all her patients love her; including us.

She would take care of every detail and we were kept well informed at all stages of what to expect and what was going on. The best part of her is that she tries to avoid surgery and as far as possible she tries for Normal delivery which is very rare now a days (at least in our experience with other hospitals and other doctors)

Though my Sister-in-law is differently abled (Deaf & Dumb), doctor spent sufficient time with her to understand her and provide treatment and suggestions with extreme patience. Frankly speaking we ourselves didn’t have a confidence that my Sister-in-law would be able to deliver normally but that’s not the case with Dr. Sapna; From day one doctor was resolute and kept guiding my Sister-in-law to maintain healthy life style which actually helped her to deliver baby normally.


If you are looking for an qualified obstetrician and gynaecologist, you must visit Dr. Sapna Lulla at Ovum Hospital, Kalyan nagar Bangalore.


She is highly recommended ..


Thanks,

Vijayalakshmi

tags: None
review:
Dear All, 

This is the first time I am taking my time to write a review on a doctor *** ******* ** **** ** **** **** * **** ******** *********. 

I consulted Dr. Sapna Lulla at Ovum hospital when I was 4 weeks pregnant to ensure that my pregnancy is safe and healthy. She recommended me to take up a blood test to understand my ‘Beta HCG’ count and a ‘scanning’ to ensure that the gestational sac is visible at the right location.

When the reports came in - the pregnancy was confirmed but was an unhealthy one, which they medically call it as ‘CERVICAL PREGNANCY’ the term which I heard for the first time in my life. To further worsen the situation, mine was a high risk cervical pregnancy where the gestational sac was at the external orifice (OS) of the uterus. The only option available for me was to terminate the pregnancy which was not at all an easy task because of the complications involved. This is where the experienced hand saved my life.

Dr. Sapna explained to me the importance of the entire case with great patience and clarity. How she is planning to go ahead with my pregnancy termination process and detailed me about the multiple methods. The best part in her is that she always tries to get the job done with minimal pain and lower risks. The entire process went for a week, but was admitted only for 2 days at hospital – first day she successfully removed the ‘sac’ and the second day I was under observation***** ** *** ***** ** *********** *** **** *** ***** *** * ***** ***** ****** She always maintains a pleasant smile on her face not matter whether it is her start or end of the day. Always with high energy level and a great passion towards her profession which is very much evident from the way she explains things, being ready to help at any point in time – couldn't believe she answered my call at 3.00AM when I started to bleed. She is very practical minded *** ********** **** *** ******** **** ** ** ********** This attitude of her really helped me to be at ease and lighter my problems.

Dr. Sapna - Thank you so much for everything, you will be always there in my prayers. Stay gold, keep shining, help as much people as you can – I am sure you will. I am very blessed to meet you.
Aparna

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Me and my husband were searching for a good doctor since we were very sure that we need to go for normal delivery inspite of many complications  and finally we got a good doctor who made our dreams come true.
I am 29 years old and I am diabetic since at the age of 27. I was very sure that I cannot go for normal delivery and baby will get operated at 9th month since for the diabetic person there is a chance of having a big baby.

From my first visit doctor was very patient and was explaining all the complications of a diabetic mother and how to overcome it.. during my entire pregnancy time I am under the watch of doctor for my sugar level. She used to answer my call even at the odd times if my sugar level is getting incerased.

The happiest part which none of the diabetic mother can have is, I delivered Full Term Baby with Normal delivery at my 39th week.

My cervix was not dilated and the doctor decided to induce labour for me. She asked me to get admitted in the hospital on Thursday and have first shot of gel to induce the labour. cervix got dilated to 2 cm and again they gave me the next shot of gel at Friday early morning and doctor advised to go for walk so that the cervix will get dilated soon. Around 1Pm I got dilated to 4 cm and took me to labour room.

Soon the dilation got more .During the labour pain all the nursing staffs were there to help me and to encourage me for baring the pain which really helped me a lot.they allowed my husband also to be with me during the labour pain which gave me the support to bare the pain.

I delivered a beautiful baby girl at around 4PM and baby was healthy. This is like a magic which was done by doctor where we all think that normal delivery is not possible for diabetic mother. She proved that it can be possible. my entire family is very thankful to the doctor for the care and support she gave to us. 

I strongly recommend all the MOM TO BE to consult  with DR.Sapna for a beautiful motherhood journey.
Thanks to all the Nursing staffs who really cared us a lot.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I ( Shilpa D) and my Husband, came to Dr. Sapna Lulla, after looking at her reviews and doing some googling about doctors in the vicinity of Nagawara and decided to consult her.

At the first visit itself we were very satisfied with her approach, listens and answers all our queries we have. At times she would write the sketches and clarify our doubts with patience. During the course of my pregnancy, she motivated and guided us in every step, from food, exercise and even the finance. At the 7th month the baby's weight was less, with suggestions from Dr. Sapna we sailed through the phase smoothly.

As my delivery dates approached i was normal and healthy, did not experience any pain. However, this time around even in 35 weeks, the baby was way up and doctor explained me to do more exercise ( like sweeping mopping etc..) and do sit ups to help the baby progress down and to get contractions.   

But the baby did not progress as expected even after 39 weeks, that’s when she advised  to get admitted and to induce labour in order to avoid any complications.

During Delivery at Hospital Motherhood HRBR Layout.

Dr. Sapana explained us the process of induced labour and timeframe for the baby progress after inducing for normal delivery. She induced the labour in the afternoon on the day we got admitted. Even after trying for almost 2 days the baby did not progress down, so she advised to go for C-section keeping in the view of baby and mothers health.. 

Even after deciding and agreeing to go for C-section, Dr. Sapna and her team had put in all the efforts to tried a lot, even waited in the labour room till 2:00am for a normal birth, before going for C-section. Finally with the support of Sapna and her team, we did deliver a healthy, beautiful baby boy.

The Hospital staff at Motherhood HRBR layout were very friendly, positive and it felt like our home. The hospital sisters were very friendly and were very to next us and took care of the mother and baby every single minute of the staty. The whole experience at the hospital was like a family get together.
 
Thank you Dr. Sapna and the Motherhood Hospital for all your support and care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My name is Priya.I am 43years old.I recently underwent a hysterectomy surgery operated by Dr.Sapna 
Lulla in motherhood hospital ,HRBR .Would like to share my experience so that other ladies suffering like me can benefit from Dr Sapna Just like I did.


 couple of days back I had severe abdominal pain and  heavy bleeding and I was heading towards a very critical stage.
After checking the reviews in google about Dr.Sapna I reached out to her on an emergency.I was very scared of gynaecologists as my past experience with some of the Docs were not great.To my surprise Dr Sapna greeted me with a nice smile and also heard me out patiently.She is an amazing Dr I have ever met.Without making me Panicky she explained the seriousness of my case and also the complexity involved while giving me the confidence of recovery.I was completely convinced with Dr Sapna and underwent the surgery couple of days back.

Mine was a very complex case of multiple fibroids with bigger ones measauring upto 7.3 CMs and my uterus was enlarged because of that.I got it successfully opearated by Dr Sapna .She took  good care of me post my surgery as well and i am doing fine now.

Many times when we are in deep pain and suffering is when we start praying God and god also responds to our prayers .In my case ,I see Dr Sapna as a god sent gift to me and I see her as my saviour .My heartfelt thanks to the Dr..Honestly no words to thank her.May god bless her and her family.

I would strongly recommend Dr Sapna for any type of abdominal surgeries Including complex surgeries based on my experience.

You made it look so simple to us that let any complication be there nothing to worry about that, you ll take care of it and infact you did it. Each time we visited you for consultation you made us feel confident and there are no worries. we are blessed with health baby boy which makes our family a complete family.

You were available for your patients all the time be it  midnight or be on a holiday. You take care of your patients with utmost care because of which people are connected to you more as friend as a human being than as a patient- doctor relationship.

Dr Sapna keep up the great work you are doing and continue doing it. God Bless.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Pregnancy experience with the Dr Sapna Lulla is Amazing, few things i've to mention here why she is so Special -

She brainwashed us on delaying/postponing parenthood and having kids later is the biggest mistake in life.

Since the time I got concieved, she took care of me & my baby like a mother. As a first time mother, I & My Dear Husband had many doubts and fears which were clarified with lots of patience and promised all the times with a smile "Trust me, I'll take care of everything".

She always says and believes "Pregnancy is not a disease, It's a sweet journey / a moment to remember in life and Enjoy every moment of it". In the entire 38 weeks of my pregnancy, I was not at all on any strict diet. After 3 months of my pregnancy she even allowed us to out-station travel by road / rail transport. Not suggested any special pregnancy exercises like other doctors does, asked me to do the household work & 30 mins walk daily. That's why I never felt I am going through pregnancy disease.

She did not ask for unnecessary tests and medicens, suggested only required things to prepare for normal pregnancy.

At 36 weeks my baby weight was almost 3.090kg, still I remember what she said after seeing the reports "If you feel the  baby weight is a concern and if you're worrying whether normal vaginal delivery happens or not if we wait for few more weeks. If you ask me to do immediate delivery for that, I strictly won't do that until 38 weeks if mother & baby both are doing well. If you are looking for such kind of options, better consult some other doctors".

She scolds when needed if there is no co-operation from Mother/Family, but that's all for good reasons :).

She is reachable all the time and will answer all the queries over the phone / WhatsApp.

The D-Day experience(Will be remembering for a lifetime) - It's on Sunday evening when I started feeling labor symptoms, I called Dr Sapna immediately and told all the symptoms. She immediately responded even though she is on off duty, and asked us to go to hospital immediately and I'll try to ASAP. She informed to her team clearly what to do before Dr arrives to the hospital. Her team took care of me very nicely, told nothing to worry. When Doctor reached hospital, she said we will wait for another 12hrs to increase naturally the intensity of labor pains. She even visited in-between (around 2am) to check the condition of mine. Finally they shifted me to labor room around 7:45am, after 2 1/2 hrs I delivered a healthy baby boy through normal vaginal delivery. And my baby birth weight was 3.500kg, many of my colleagues didn't believed when I said delivered a baby of 3.5kg weight through normal delivery. And specially I have to mention Dr Swetha who took care of me very well in the labor room, allowed my Dear Husband to stay with  me in the labor when I am in tense.   

Thank you Dr Sapna for everything, you brought colors into my life. I wish more and more doctors walk in Dr Sapna's path where a mother can leave all fears about normal delivery because there is nothing greater than natural birth. I strongly recommend Dr Sapna Lulla for all your concerns with pregnancy and delivery.

tags: None
review:
After 5 years of marriage with 2 miscarriage and 1 premature expired baby at 8th month due to pregnancy induced hypertension,in June 2017, we met Dr.Sapna Lulla in Ovum hospital for our 4th pregnancy of one month due. She patiently listen our previous case history. We went with pregnancy confirmation check pad, she told to scan immediately for proper closure of uterus in Silver line  scan centre. It is Sunday she told I will be in hospital upto 2pm, after scan meet me. From that day onwards for 32 weeks she told to take Ecosprin for controlling hypertension. She given confident to us with smile and hope. During our entire preganancy duration we just follow her advice. No unnecessary scan and injection. We did only 4 scans, 2 times TT injection. She told take Dailycal and orfer xt tablet for calcium, folic acid and iron supplements for entire duration. In 32th week scan she told there is low level of fluid and given supplement sachet for increasing fluid. Once again scan is done on 37th week but fluid level is low further. She told to admit same day night, on 09-02-2018 at 11:25pm she taken our prince safely through C-section. After 3 days of hospital we discharged. Both baby and mother safe under her supervision. We started follow her from Ovum and then moved to motherhood HRBR layout. She made our life meaningful after 6 years of marriage. Our entire pregnancy cost around 1.5 lakhs. 
We strongly recommend her for anyone who  looking for Good Gynecologist. One of the plus point about her is in a day out of 24 hours she is in hospital for 16 hours. Last 3 years more than 1000 deliveries.
Thank you mam for all your care and concerns.

With love Pon Janani and Kannan with our prince Aaravamudhan K.R.

tags: None
review:
When it comes to choosing the right doctor everyone would go the extra mile to get the best care.. !!

Pregnancy and its care till your bundle of joy is delivered necessitates care at a whole new level..!!

Me and my husband take much honour and pride in sharing the experience we've had in Motherhood Hospital - HRBR Layout Branch with Dr.Sapna Lulla and her entire team along with the Paediatricians, Anaesthetists, Nursing Staff, Support Staff, Administrative and House Keeping Staff.

Dr.Sapna Lulla is the most Supportive Doctor I ever met, and it truly is a blessing to have been cared and supported by her. 

Dr.Sapna inspires confidence in you through out pregnancy, even in the most critical condition she will assure you that things would be fine.. You just  need to follow her advice and medications..!!

A very patient-centric Doctor, who cares to listen to all of the patient's concerns and who provides the necessary details and management options which are beneficially directed towards both the Mother as well as the Baby. 

She would never force you with any decision but will always guide you with a detailed explanation which helps a lot in taking meaningful decisions...!!

A big thank you to Dr. Sapna and her team that we had a cute little baby girl on 7th Sept 2017 in Motherhood HRBR Layout Branch..!! 

We would HIGHLY RECOMMEND - Dr. Sapna and the facility at Motherhood HRBR Layout for having your bundle of joy delivered...

Kudos to the entire team again...!! 

Thanks is too small to show our gratitude, but still thank you very very very much!

Good Luck to Dr.  Sapna Lulla and entire Motherhood Team @ HRBR Layout..
 
Keep spreading smiles � �

tags: None
review:
We are very happy to say that we successfully completed our pregnancy-to-delivery journey with the help of ovum hospitals.

We stay in HBR layout and we opted Ovum hospitals with little bit of hesitation since it is being new in Kalyana Nagar area. With first consultation with Dr. Sapna, we were at ease. 

Dr. Sapna is quite experienced and clear headed doctor. I guess she is one of the busiest doctor in Ovum. She interacts with patients lively and makes us feel comfortable. She patiently answers our questions. She is very courteous too. She is quite risk avert. She will ask you to go thought most of the standard tests to make sure to know health of the baby and mother at every step.

When we were into the 7th month of pregnancy, she gave her personal contact number so that we can directly contact her in case of any emergencies. Let me tell you that she answers our calls at odd hours as she promised. On the day of the delivery also she came down to hospital at midnight (1AM) and stayed till the time of delivery at 8:30AM. She is mostly in favor of normal delivery. During those 7 and half hours of critical, anxious and fearful wait, she kept us updating on the condition of the patient as and when required. She listens to our opinions too during those hours! It helped us to finally have safe normal delivery.

Overall we are highly appreciative of Dr. Sapna Lulla’ s efforts in making our family complete with that smooth delivery of new baby. We wish her all the best for her career ahead at Ovum hospitals.

tags: None
review:
To start of writing my experience with DR Sapna, it was Excellent!!I
I had been visiting her since 2014 for my wife and taking treatments under her.
This time it was for my Mother who was told by another doctor for uterus removal. That is when we decided to take second opinion from Doctor Sapna regarding this.
To start off she was perfect in assessing the problem  for which we had approached her. She checked all the reports and told us we need to do few more test to come to a conclusive result that what kind of surgery needs to be performed and the current state of the problem to be assessed.
After all this most importantly she explained what procedure would be done, the recovery time line and tips to overcome the problems which can be expected during this surgery.
Now after the surgery we feel very confident that we approached the right Doctor to get this surgery done. DR.Sapna is very calm, approachable, patient enough to listen to us and most importantly very smiling which relives from the pain gone or going through while talking to her.
Post-surgery she did explain what was done in the OT and explained how the whole procedure was performed in simple terms which was helpful for us to understand.
A doctor who doesn't see the timings and receives call at any point of time for her patients & representatives for any questions which marks her amazing quality and dedication to whatever she does. She explains in detail what is the best thing in a situation we are & what can be done and needs to be done which brings confidence on the spot.
Overall it was brilliant experience and would definitely recommend DR Sapna to Family and Friends and also to people who are reading this review and hope this will help you whenever you are looking for a doctor for any similar cases as she has vast knowledge and conducts detailed research before arriving to conclusions.
Thank you Doctor Sapna & her team at Ovum.

review:
With great sense of satisfaction, we are glad to share our experience with Dr Sapna Lulla, who is incredible, ************** sensitive and very good at decision making for her patients. She is the one who can identify the underlying well before the time so that she can cure it well before. Damayanti & Manav
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words Damayanti and our journeys go long.The pride in this relationship is mutual.God bless my munchkins.

tags: None
review:
After first consultation with Sapna I immidately decided that I want to stay with her till the end of my pregnancy, we even followed her from ovum to motherhood.
First thing you notice about Dr. Sapna is her Smile, even if she is in middle of so many things she doesn’t let that affect consultations. She is very friendly and good listener. She recognises the problem/health conditions just with a glance and suggest necessary action for it.
She made sure that I am very comfortable and not confuse or frightened about any medical condition. She clarifies each doubt, and we asked tone of them. 
She delivered my second child, a boy baby in Feb 2018 through c-section. My first born was also a c-section birth, throughout my pregnancy she was very confident and reassuring.
Right up till the end she continued to engage my family, including my 5 year old daughter. Dr. Sapan is a great doctor and in high demand, which also translates to waiting time, but it was worth it. We are very thankful to Sapna and her team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi, I would like to share our experience with Doctor Sapna. My wife has been carrying our second baby during 2017. She faced severe complications during 3rd month of pregnancy. She had Hetrotropic pregnancy which is rarest of rare. Anyone can browse and check how complicated is this. (A heterotopic pregnancy is a rare complication of pregnancy in which both extra-uterine (ectopic pregnancy) and intrauterine pregnancy occur simultaneously). Doctor took this situation as challenge and guided us step by step and sorted out all the complications. Also every time we visited, she would give such positive vibes which would make us very confident. She really took care of my wife like a baby. With the days/months passing, Doctor took the right decision to operate at right time. Finally on 29th Dec 2017, my wife delivered a Baby Girl, full healthy. Both mother & baby are now healthy and fine.  We are very thankful to Dr Sapna. I strongly suggest the doctor to anyone who are looking forward for a Gynecologist.

Regards
Venugopal

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Sapna Lulla is the most supporting and friendly doctor I have seen. I found her through online search as I was new to Bangalore and didn't know anyone who can suggest me a good Gynecologist.

We started visiting Dr. Sapna in another hospital but we moved to Motherhood with her. She is very patient and supportive. She answered all my questions with lot of patience and spent decent amount of time with each patient. 

During my labor too, she was very helpful and encouraging. Mine was a very fast progressing labor, I guess. She kept all the staff on toes and made them assist me as fast as they can. 

Though Motherhood Kalyan Nagar is a new branch and had some initial start-up infrastructure issues, she made sure that everything is on place for safe deliveries, normal or c- section. 

The best part is, Dr. Sapna always tries to encourage normal delivery by making us work (physically), though some feel it's very tiring during pregnancy. She made me walk, take stairs, squats and encouraged me to do all household work, ultimately I ended up with a safe and quick normal delivery.

I can't express my gratitude towards her with just a THANK YOU.

I strongly recommend visiting her for your pregnancy related issues.

Thank you Dr. Sapna for your support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Sapana took care of me during my pregnancy and after the delivery as well. Her experience and judgement helped us manage our IUGR ( intra uterine growth retardation) baby and take timely decision on delivery date. I hope my feedback helps people with high risk pregnancies and other complications while choosing a gynaecologist.  First thing I noticed about Dr Sapana was her consultative rather than patronising style of interaction. She encourages discussion and explains well while paying personal attention to her patients. She has a calming and cheerful presence and managed my fears, worries and doubts well. She took very good care of me pre and post Nataly, was always 'just a call away'. This easy approachability was very reassuring for me.
She also understands financial implications of unnecessary tests, investigations and hospital admission and maintains a good balance. I would sum up by saying that Dr Sapana is a competent professional who is expert in management of high risk pregnancies and preg related complications while following 'good practice' guidelines. I had first trimester bleed, pre term labour, and IUGR baby but with her expertise , support and encouragement, I could carry till 36 weeks and am a period patent to a healthy 7 weeks old baby. All the 'waiting area' waits were worth it!!

review:
Recently I delivered a baby girl. It was a C section....  But I must tell you that Dr. Swapna tried her level best to make it normal. 
I was referred to Dr. Swapna Lulla by Dr. Harshitha. I started consulting Dr. Swapna Lulla  in my 3rd month of pregnancy.  My pregnancy was not easy I had a miscarriage earlier and I was suffering from high BP also.  In the first meeting only I was sure that I am in safe hands and she is the one who can really help me.  Dr. Swapna makes her patients very comfortable and explains everything in detail.  It was only because of her which made my pregnancy really smooth. In the 5th month I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes. She took care of my sugar levels very well.  She was always there in every thick and thin times. She always stands by her patients, not only as a doctor but as a friend, as a counselor and as a well wisher too. In this corporate world You find very few doctors who are devoted to their profession and who believe in service....  Dr. Swapna Lulla is one of them. 
I am really blessed to find a doctor like her. I am really thankful to Dr. Swapna Lulla for being there as a support system for me.  
I would highly recommend Dr. Swapna Lulla to all the patients out there who are in search of a good doctor. *** ** *** **** ************ ** *** ******

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had consulted Dr. Sapna Lulla at Ovum Hospitals six months before I planned for my pregnancy for the PCOS treatment. I had taken treatment for the PCOS and had conceived naturally.

I continued my consultation with her through out the pregnancy term. She had been very supportive and very patient.

Before delivery there were many fears in my mind for the pregnancy term, postpartum care and the pain of delivery. 

I had a C-section, after labor was induced as the baby heart beat was fluctuating and dipping due to lack of oxygen supply. Doctor informed us that it would be a emergency C-section.

My husband had accompanied me in the operation theater. The baby had water in her lungs at birth, as she started breathing inside the womb due to lack of oxygen supply to the baby.

The baby was shifted to NICU immediately and was there for almost 48hrs, we felt low but kept our hopes and didn't panic for the babies condition.

The good care of the hospital staff inside the NICU and even outside the NICU for myself and baby ensured that our baby doll was completely fine. 

HATS OFF TO THE DOCTOR AND HOSPITAL FOR THE CARE TAKEN OF THE NEWBORN AND NEW MOM.

tags: None
review:
Thanks to Dr.Sapna Lulla

Dr Sapna had already done 2 successful deliveries for my sister. She is so reliable that I preferred her for my delivery. I had been to Ovum in my 9 th month. It was my first pregnancy and I didn't have any complications throughout, as per my scan at 37th week my dew date was 10 th of October. Though I had 3 weeks time I was regularly in touch with Dr Sapna as instructed by her. She went through my history and suggested regular exercises. She explains in a very clear manner which made easy for me to understand and implement. She never delayed response wen ever I gave her a call. 
I consulted her in the morning as I was consistently getting pains, she checked and suggested for NST then the process started as the contractions kept increasing. Pregnancy and labour is unpredictable process, I was all nervous but she kept me on with her positive vibes until the baby was born. I gave birth to a boy baby at 10 pm on 27th sep, next day by evening i was discharged and was suggested for regular check ups.
Undoubtedly felt safe in the hands of Dr. Sapna at Ovum.

context: Pregnancy,Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: We're fortunate first time parents - blessed to be a mother - we owe this and more, including our first-time-parents'-sleepless-nights, to Dr. Sapna Lulla. We wouldn't have been as happy and confident now, lest for the tireless efforts of our wonderful and straight forward Doctor and her amazing team at Sapna Health Care. From day 1 - she's been guiding us, the do's and dont's, what to eat and what not to, in conjunction with regular consultations, amidst these pandemic times. You know you're consulting with the right person when you're asked not to subscribe to any fancy packages from fancy hospital chains - we will 'both' (Doc and us) work together towards a normal delivery - a rarity. Doctor gave me a lot of confidence throughout my pregnancy. We've had the pleasure of calling up and pinging her at odd hours, about this niggle or another - we were however, dealt with politely and advised appropriately of what's OK n what's not. Mind you, we were given the freedom to call n inquire about any discomfort n this did arise after midnight n fortunately, we were not brushed aside but were immediately called for a check up, turns out, we had to rush to our chosen hospital - Dr Sapna arranged for everything while we were enroute n lo-behold, our son was born the same night. She has helped us bring a new life into this world - a naughty, pooping, irritating and yet, joyful and a loving son..! We cannot thank her enough for this gift of life..!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Great Experience ! I would first like to extend my sincere gratitude and appreciation to Dr.Sapna for her constant support in helping me have a safe and normal delivery. We have been consulting Dr.Sapna from the very first month of my pregnancy. My husband and I always dreamt of delivering our child normally and our dream came true only because of this wonderful doctor who worked miracles for us. I had an issue with my water levels from the beginning of my 9th month and was able to pull off till the end of the month only with Dr.Sapna's continuous monitoring and treatment. She encouraged us to stay positive at every phase and ensured that we smoothly sailed through the last month till delivery. She maintained transparency and and educated us about every course of treatment. Her patience and dedication towards her patients and profession is commendable. A doctor who is so passionate towards her profession is hard to find and I'm really grateful to our friends (Vishal & Shilpa) who recommended Dr.Sapna to us. 
We are forever indebted to her for her selfless service. Thank you doctor for being a blessing in disguise and an advocate of God in bringing our bundle of joy to this world.

Blessings to you and your family :) (Sapna Healthcare Family - Meenakshi, Rachel & Sushma for being so patient and supportive each time we made a visit to the clinic - God Bless)

A big thank you from baby Christine Rachel, Simon & Monisha

tags: Doctor friendliness,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: We are thankful to Dr. Sapna for making our dream come true and helping us in having our little bundle of joy in November. Last year when me and my husband were planning for a child,we decided to go for Dr. Sapna based on rave practo reviews .She is very friendly, down to earth, does not like to prescribe medicines unless absolutely necessary. At the same time, she is very diligent in monitoring the foetus health. I was really amazed by the fact that she sees so many patients every day and yet remembers details about me during my visits. Her counseling helped me to come out of depressing state of mind too when i had the complications like subchorionic bleed & placenta previa. By the grace of god and with the great support by Dr. Sapna, now we are enjoying our new life as parents with our 3 month old baby girl. She will always be in my prayers. God bless Dr. Sapna & her family.I highly recommend Dr. Sapna to all those couple who are looking for a normal delivery & trust me you wont regret. She is such a gem !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hi I am lucky enough to get to know about Dr Sapna Lulla. I initially met Dr for sexual problems. After taking medication from Dr I was able to become pregnant. Dr is very friendly and her positive approach in all the situation has made me stronger. From the time of pregnancy till delivery Dr was very helpful. From the time of pregnancy till delivery I was scared and not cooperative enough Dr had enough patience to tolerate me and successfully help me with a normal delivery I want to thank Dr from the bottom of my heart. Thank you so much Dr me and my baby is fine and doing good because of you. Not only me my family and my husband is also thankful to you from their bottom of the heart. I still feel it's a dream me giving a normal delivery where initially I used cry for sexual intercourse. Once again thank you Dr

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I took my time writing this, as I knew that once I did, it would end up being a long one. I never guessed how much work two children are! Dr Sapna delivered my second child, a girl baby, in October 2017 through C section. My first born was also a c section birth, and though both doctor and I were keen to wait for a normal birth, (the doctor more so than I) for many unforseen events and having passed the 40 weeks mark, I asked her to operate. Throughout my pre and post natal care she was friendly, confident, ************* and very reassuring. I never felt patronised or heard her make any condescending remark. She always heard us out thoroughly, never rushed us or made us feel unimportant. Right up till the end she spent a few minutes engaging us and our older child in conversation. Though visiting her often required much waiting since she is a doctor in high demand, it was worth it in the end to see her smiling face and easy manner that gave u the necessary boost to continue happily in the pregnancy and to take pleasure in it. We are very grateful that she held our hand through this process and helped guide us towards becoming 2nd time parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
*** ***** ***** ** *** ** *** ****** ***** ** ********** I consulted her since the third month of my pregnancy. I was going through many hardships during my early pregnancy. Dr. Sapna treated me and gave me confidence to come out of the difficult situation at many instances.

Even though, my first baby was through C Section, she was still trying till end for the normal delivery as there was enough gap between my first and second baby. However, we had to take a call for C section as contractions were not developed and baby was nearing full term.  There were some unexpected complications experienced during my C section and she handled it very well and also highlighted the need of taking special care of the baby to the Pediatrician/ NICU. 

Post-delivery, she continued to provide good advises to overcome the pain and other problems, I was going through. In fact, at difficult times, she had provided advice/treatment over Whatsapp in odd hours.

She is a very humble person and treats her patients with respect and  becomes your partner in your journey of Motherhood. She is very passionate and professional about her job. Overall, a great experience and association with her.

Thank you so much Dr. Sapna

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I decided to consult Dr. Sapna only after reviewing close to 300 reviews in practo and now i can say that i had made the right decision. From the first visit our consultation was satisfactory and we gained confidence in each visit. The only good thing i personally liked is her way of approach and explanation. Whether it may be a normal or a complicated issue many doctors lack in the way it has to be explained but she is worth it!  By the god's grace my pregnancy period was normal and didn't had any trouble. Even when she moved to a different hospital we didn't change our track. Unfortunately i didn't go to labor till my 39 weeks and finally got admitted. From the time i got admitted i had belief on this doc as she would keep me safe. I was finally blessed with a baby boy under the supervision of Dr. Sapna and her team by C-section. Even when the doctor explained the complication to my better half she portrayed in a right way which made us get convinced. Cutting it short i would give a thumbs up to this lady and i would recommend everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I started visiting Dr Sapna when I was 8 weeks pregnant. From then on, every visit was a very satisfying experience. Dr Sapna was very approachable and was available anytime for any issues that I had during the 40 weeks of my pregnancy. She was always available to address any queries or concerns that I had.

It was during the last week of my pregnancy that she moved to Motherhood hospitals. Though I was not very sure about moving to a new hospital that was in its setting up phase, it was the confidence and trust that I had in Dr Sapna that helped me take the decision to shift. And I must mention that Doctor made sure that everything was in place and I got the best of what was available at the hospital. Her early morning visits ( 4 in the morning!) just to make sure that everything was ok , itself shows her concern for her patients. 

Dr Sapna’s friendly attitude and commitment to her profession is commendable. Based on my experience, I would strongly recommend Dr Sapna to my family and friends!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ****** *** **** ** ****** ** **** *** ********* ** *** **** ** *** ****** We had been been with Dr Sapna for the more than 9 months for the birth of our second son. From Day 1 she had been extremely helpful, caring &  friendly with us and had always ensured that she explains everything in detail without worrying for the clock. In times where most of the gynaes are hand in glove with hospital to churn out c-sec deliveries one after another enriching their coffers , she is a class apart in terms of her humane and considerate approach towards patients. Our first baby was born as an emergency C section at 32 weeks because of IUGR and we were expecting our second baby on the same lines. *** *** ** *******  ********** ****** the pregnancy went untill 39th week and were blessed with a healthy baby boy on 19th Sept'17.
