Her sweet demeanour and patient centric attitude is a rare trait which she is blessed with in abundance. We strong believe just a single visit to Dr Sapna, will get you a doctor friend for life..... tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I was referred to Dr Sapna by a colleague. My journey of knowing Dr Sapna started when I first visited her for PCOD, though it was initial stages i was still dreading conceiving but all my meetings with Dr Sapna were so assuring and motivating. She always made things easy for me by assuring me that things would be fine. and luckily right through the beginning till today things did go fine.
She is the only Doctors I have seen in Bangalore who always wanted to treat me naturally than prescribing medicines. All our visits she made us feel like we were talking to a family member. She is very approachable and always has a smiling face which makes things so much easy. I would have never carried a normal delivery if not for her motivation right through the beginning. I rem she did not give up on me right till the end and made sure I have a natural delivery procedure. I am thankful God first then her for helping me deliver a healthy and beautiful baby girl. I would definitely recommend Dr Sapna if you would like to have a hassle free and most importantly a normal delivery.

I would def visit her if i plan to conceive again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ******* **** **** **** We got to know about her from one of our friend and decided to give a try. Me and my husband visited her when I was 8weeks pregnant with lots of sickness and worries. First day itself she made me comfortable and gave confidence that made us to continue with her. Best part about Dr. Sapna was that she didn't give me more medicines and did listen to all my concerns very patiently. She explains all the concerns very  peacefully and make sure that me and my husband understands and become confident to overcome those. Me as a first time mother had lots of doubts and sometimes they were really silly. Dr. Sapna handled all those very patiently. I was very particular on giving a natural birth from the beginning. Dr Sapna gave me all the confidence throughout my pregnancy to have that. And finally I naturally/normally delivered a cute baby girl under her observation. Me and my baby both are doing great now. tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
This was my second pregnancy and after a lot of deliberation we decided to consult Dr. Sapna Lulla at Ovum Hospitals. 
At the first visit itself we were very satisfied with her approach and we decided that she would be the person doing my delivery. She is a very patient person, listens and answers all our queries we have. She would even go to the extent of clarifying your questions on whatsapp. 

My first child was a normal delivery and we hoped the same for the second one as well. However, this time around even in 35 weeks, the baby was in breech position and doctor explained how dangerous it would be for the baby if she goes for a normal delivery considering the weight of the baby. So she advised to go for C-section
With the support of Dr. Sapna and her team, we did deliver a healthy, beautiful baby boy weighing 3.1 kgs. Dr. is also very friendly, positive and full of energy as a person. She always has a big smile and positive attitude which gives us the much needed confidence. Thank you Doctor and the Ovum Hospital for all your support and care.

tags: None
review:
This review is long pending but I couldn't not write one as it is very well deserved. 
I consulted another doctor from the start of my pregnancy till 35 weeks. I'd had several sleepless nights during those 35 weeks as I'd lost complete faith in my doctor and confidence in myself. 
I was on the lookout for another doctor when my friend who consulted Doctor Sapna throughout her pregnancy recommended her to me and told me nothing but great things about her. 
That evening I decided to call Doctor Sapna, and that is by far the best thing I've done. 
She listened to all I had to say and said "watch a movie with your husband tonight and have a great night and see me tomorrow, a pregnant lady of 35 weeks shouldn't worry like you" 
That conversation instilled so much confidence in me and I knew what I'm doing was so right! 
At 36 weeks, we realized that my water content was low, baby's head isn't fixed yet and the NST wasn't great. Went into labour as per her advice. 
We were almost sure that it's going to be a C-section, she assured me that she would try everything she could for a normal birth and she did! 
We're now blessed with a beautiful baby girl, had a normal delivery. 
Every time I look at my baby and thank the Gods, I keep Doctor Sapna in my prayers. 
My only regret is that I couldn't spend my nine precious months with her. ****** ***** ***** *** ****** ******

tags: None
review:
Well, we were looking for a consultant in our nearby location and came to know about Dr Sapna. We checked her reviews over internet.I would say she stands every praise that people have written for her. Our experience from the first day we visited her till now has been awesome. She is excellent in her profession, experienced in handling complex cases. She is very caring and listens to patient's concerns patiently and calmly. She is cool minded and always keeps her patients relaxed. One concern which now a days everyone has in their mind while consulting any doctor is usually they recommend unnecessary medicines and tests.With Dr Sapna and Ovum hospital you can be rest assured that this is not the case. She recommends only the required tests and medicines. 
She does her best to have a normal delivery for her patients. For us she awaited for several hours so that to have normal delivery.
Coming to Ovum hospital service, the staffs are very courteous and helpful. They take every care to help patients.
******* * ***** *** ** ***** ** *** **** ********** ** ***** ********* *** **** ** *** **** ******** *** **********

tags: None
review: I was referred to Ovum and Dr Sapna Lulla by a colleague. I have been suffering with back and  abdominal pain for years. Every scan I was asked to do said I have fibroids but all the doctors (prior) said not to do anything with them. It was when it became unbearable for the last couple of months that I wanted to visit a new doctor. I am only thankful that I came across Dr Sapna Lulla, she not only gave me the right picture on what needs to be done but also was extremely positive about how this had to be handled. She suggested that I undergo Myomectomy, an open surgery to remove my fibroids which had now grown really big. What I admire the most is that before suggesting this, she took personal interest in discussing this with other doctors to ensure that this was the best possible way of dealing with my fibroids. Since my husband and I have blind trust and faith in her, we went ahead. I had my surgery done on 5th May’16 at Ovum and was thoroughly impressed by the hospital services as well as the staff. It’s a great hospital which takes good care of their patients and also positively responded to all our queries/needs while in the hospital. I now refer Dr Sapna to every person I meet, for me she’s the best doctor I have met so far in Bangalore. She takes great care of her patients and also knows how to cheer them up & make them feel comfortable when they need it the most. For me, it’s only Dr Sapna for my future pregnancy and Ovum hospital for my delivery.

tags: None
review: We are extremely grateful to the team at Ovum Hospital led by Dr Sapna Lulla for the safe delivery of our baby girl under very critical condition on 16.4.16. One evening 4 days before my EDD we visited Dr Sapna for a regular check up and she noticed a very subtle drop in the heart beat of the baby. The nurses and the Doctor spent close to 2 hrs checking and re-checking to make doubly sure they were seeing it right. I dont know of any hospital that offers such huge amount of personal care. Since it was evening and there was no scope of doing an Ultrasound to see how the baby was, Dr Sapna purely based on her experience guessed that the umbilical cord may be around the baby's neck causing the fall in the heart beat. She suggested an emergency C-section. When we agreed to that the hospital took less than 20 mins to get the entire team of doctors and anasthetist etc for doing the surgery even though it was late at night. It turned out to be exactly how the Doctor had guessed. The umbilical cord was around the baby's neck and legs and her fingers were digging into the cord. It took a whole lot of intelligent effort by the team to deliver the baby safely. If the doctor wouldnt have made that critical decision I do not know how the baby would have been. Thank you so much Dr Sapna...we will always be grateful to God and to you for our baby...

tags: None
review: From Day 1 Dr. Sapna Lulla will provide you personalised attention during consultations and ensure as a patient you understand why every medicine or test is being prescribed for you. She is someone who is extremely passionate about her field and will always go the extra mile for her patients. Dr Sapna is not just a great doctor who is well versed in her field but also comes across as very friendly and motivating for her patients. You will always feel safe in her hands and comfortable knowing she will do all it takes to ensure you and the life growing inside of you are safe. I had a safe delivery with Dr Sapna which started out as a normal delivery and then due to complications ended up as a C-section, she ensured that the baby and I were safe at the end of it. Also she is someone who insists that one goes through with a normal delivery, will only go to c-section if medically needed. All in all it has been a great 9 months consulting with Dr Sapna, I would highly recommend her for all expecting mothers. Thank you Dr. Sapna for helping us bring our bundle of joy into this world !!

tags: None
review:
iam blessed with a baby boy, thanks to dr. sapna lulla and her team, 
one of my neighbour recommender us and suggested us to go to dr.sapna in ovum hospital, i would like to thank her for her suggestion, 
for us the journey of nine months were filled with ups and down, but coz of sapna maam we were able to pass it smoothly,  she is very understanding, patiently listens to our query and clarifies it, 
from the very beginning she was preparing us for the normal delivery, she was very encouraging, and finally on 25 march 2016 we were blessed with a baby boy on normal delivery, 
she was very cooperative and dealt with all the pregnancy related issues be it thyroid or fear of gestational diabetes or haemorrhoids due to pregnancy, or rashes in skin and many more problems during pregnancy, she was always there to guide us and make us feel relaxed, i still remember after every visit to sapna maam my wife used to feel very confident.
iam really surprised to see the level of patience and calmness showed by the staffs in labour room, a big thanks to all the team members who made my family complete.
overall, it was a very gud experience with ovum hospital, i would highly recommend all the pregnant ladies  to go to Dr. sapna lulla in ovum hospital.

tags: None
review:
I am glad and fortunate to know Dr Sapna Lulla who is a Senior Gynae at Ovum hospital –Bangalore. I had a wonderful experience with Dr Sapna throughout my pregnancy till the time of delivery.  She was so approachable, friendly and shares great rapport with her patients. She took personal interest in me and always ready to answer any queries and listens patiently throughout.  She is extremely knowledgeable due to her years of experience which is very comforting. She took the time to explain every procedure she was doing and takes care of me with great attention. Her professional approach definitely helped to increase the hospital's success rate.

So all you women out there, if you are looking for a good Gynae – Dr Sapna Lulla is the one!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Harmonal Imbalance,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
Dr Sapna Lulla has been my Gynecologist for almost 10 Years now.

I have consulted her for :
1. Irregular Periods due to Harmonal Imbalance
2. First Unsuccessful Pregnancy and DNC
3. Second Pregnancy, Critical and Successful Pregnancy - Normal Vaginal Delivery
4. Post delivery Care
5. Third Pregnancy, Critical and Successful Pregnancy - Emergency LSCS & Preterm  Delivery

A lot of things impress me to go back to her for my gynecological concerns:
1. Perfection in Job & Doctor's Knowledge 
2. Listen & Understand each concern and explain the problem/solution in layman's terms.
3. No unnecessary Lab Tests 
4. The checklist on vaccination and timely tests during pregnancy
5. Decision making and driving it to perfect finish
6. Patient First Approach
7. The way she listens and teaches junior doctors/surgeons!

Such positive vibes around her, make patients calm and positive to go back to her and talk about their problems (including silly questions regarding health) comfortably and seek suggestions and required support.

The doctor is well connected and concerned about the patient's physical and mental health during pregnancy or any genealogical related problems.
reply_text: Thanks for the meticulous observation.Totally my pleasure to deliver you .

review: I have been visiting Dr. Sapna Lulla since March 2020 for my first pregnancy. I would highly recommend Dr. Sapna Lulla. Her bright and energetic personality immediately made me feel comfortable the very first time I visited her. She answered all my questions very patiently (even the silly ones). She was also very accommodating about the fears and concerns that I had regarding pregnancy. Her support made me feel more confident through the tough pregnancy and my pre existing health conditions. Apart from handling my health related issues, she also communicated with the hospital staff and made sure that my emergency delivery was performed in a very smooth manner without any stress or tension. She has her own team of doctors who accompany her wherever she performs the delivery- this made me feel much more confident that I would be well taken care of. She is very clear in her explanation of the situation and if the patient's condition requires immediate attention she ensures that she takes necessary steps to sort things out instantly. Dr. Sapna is always reachable on the phone and also replies to questions on WhatsApp. Apart from being a thorough professional, Dr. Sapna is also very considerate towards her patients and does her best to help them in every possible way. It is really important to have trust in one's doctor and to feel comfortable in asking any questions that one might have and I'm really glad that I met Dr. Sapna. Thank you, Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
******** **** ***** *** * ****** ****** **** **** Tons and tons of thanks to Dr Sapna Mam who just took care of ours like her own family. 
Considering the fact the situation of my wife was a very critical one and she was facing a rare complication, Dr Sapna has always been there for us giving the much needed moral and emotional support and guiding us through the right direction to proceed with at every stage of the pregnancy. The doctor did understand her situation helped us in every way she could during my wife's critical months and helped us in all ways namingly , attending us with priority for regular check-up as sitting for long was not good for my wife's health , advising the right time to get hospitalized whenever there could be a risk of some mishappeninng , how these  additional expenses due to the critical situation can be as less as possible with no compromise on health related required treatments etc etc

We had an idea that there could be serious complications in the process but she managed the operation very well and things are under control now. She has been a saviour and  her skills, extra care , dedication and regular support has helped her get off from a life and risk situation and finally we blessed with baby boy.

Once again lots of thanks to her and I would sat that its will be sincere recommendation to others to consult Dr. Sapna atleast once and she will ensure you will have a smiling face at the end.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It's been around 2 months since I gave birth to my darling daughter under supervision of Dr.Sapna. I came to bangalore during the 4th month of my pregnancy and decided to consult Dr.Sapna based on her rave reviews on practo. I must say me and my husband were happy with our choice from the first consult. She is very friendly,  down to earth,  does not like to prescribe medicines unless absolutely necessary.  At the same time,  she is very diligent in monitoring the foetus health.  I was really amazed by the fact that she sees so many patients every day and yet remembers details about me during my visits. Since my lo's growth was not proportionate (based on growth scans),  during the 39th week,  labor had to be induced.  After 12 hours I was still not dilating and hence dr decided to go for c section (baby's heart beat was little erratic at that point). The surgery was uncomplicated and she kept talking to me throughout.  She even explained to my relatives waiting outside on why we had to go for C section. Post delivery,  she helped me alleviate my fears when I had low milk production (in the initial week)  as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Sapna explained the next steps and to-dos at every step of my pregnancy. She mostly focuses on natural remedies like getting nutrition from food rather than taking supplements. Her focus on getting a normal delivery is commendable, she will prepare you mentally and physically for a normal delivery. She guided me and did regular check on me during my entire labor pain. In fact she was in the hospital the entire night (when I was admitted with labor pains) and the following day without a break. The foetal heart rate was personally monitored by the doctor continuously for over 10 hours since there was a drop in it and eventually she succeeded in giving me a normal delivery. Such level of dedication and commitment from such a senior doctor is really commendable. I consider myself lucky to have found Dr. Sapna (recommended by a friend).
She also counselled me post-partum when I was going through some emotional distress. Thanks a lot doctor. My husband and I are really grateful to you maam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I started to consult Dr. Sapna lulla at Motherhood hospital during my 2nd month of pregnancy. I was faced some Placental insufficiency and Fetus Asymetric IUGR on 8th month of pregnency.In this situation  Dr.Sapna showed a lot of concern and interest in my case.Later She switched to Cloudnine hospital and we are also decided to continue with her at Cloudnine hospital. Dr. Sapna's sense of confidence in any given situation is the best part about consulting her.. *** ** * ****** ******** energetic, enthusiastic and positive person and she gives a lot of positive energy to the mother to be ! Another great quality of Dr Sapna is that she always recommends natural remedies to normal pregnancy related problems.

Dr.Sapna is always available and accessible and told me to call her at any time(day or night) if I face any issues.

I am truely and confidently saying that meeting doctor Sapna Lulla was a blessing. She is such a genuine and friendly doctor which I have never seen. 

I would like to thank Dr.Sapna being there for me and  I would highly recommended Dr.Sapna to any mother to be.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Going through childbirth is a journey full of joy, emotions and fear and your doctor is a key companion throughout this journey.
Dr Sapna Lulla guided us nicely & made sure that our journey was smooth and comfortable. Her presence at every stage of pregnancy and delivery is priceless. We thank her for comforting us at all times and taking away all our stress.
Be it precautions at various stages of pregnancy, or tips to prepare for the D-day, with a smile on her face she helped us to bring our little bundle of joy into this world via normal delivery. As this was our first experience, we had our own apprehensions about normal delivery as baby weight was more, however she convinced us and prepared us mentally for the delivery.

Thank you is not enough for all the efforts and commitment put in by her. She was always available on phone, whats app at the time of need for our questions, reports, or for any issues. Her presence during labor and delivery was very comforting and encouraging. 

Dr Sapna Lulla rightly prooves that “Doctors are living Gods”.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Seven years ago, my wife delivered a premature baby at 24 weeks of pregnancy and that baby did not survive.  In January this year, when we learnt that my wife conceived again spontaneously, we wanted to consult the best available doctor.  On the advice of a friend, we started consulting Dr.Sapna Lulla.  At that time, we did not know that we did the best possible thing.  Dr.Sapna Lulla literally did MAGIC.  We had an absolutely smooth journey for 38 full weeks, after which my wife delivered a baby boy NORMALLY under the personal supervision of Dr.Sapna Lulla on the most auspicious day of Sri Krishna Janmastami.  What more can we ask for?  It has been a totally pleasurable experience with Dr.Sapna Lulla preempting and preventing all the possible complications.  I have no second thoughts in strongly recommending Dr.Sapna Lulla to each and every prospective mother.  It is amazing that Dr.Sapna Lulla thoroughly enjoys her severely demanding schedule that makes her run up the stairs every other day (rather every other morning/afternoon/evening/night) to attend to an impending delivery.  Thanks to the passion and love of Dr.Sapna Lulla for her profession, we are happy parents of a baby boy, whom everybody is suggesting to name as KRISHNA.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dear Dr. Sapna,

After spending years struggling to find a gynaecologist in Bangalore with whom we would be able to connect and have a comfortable relationship with, we finally got the chance to meet you and seek help in addressing our concerns and showing us the right path to be able to go the family way. We may never be able to express how grateful we are for this. As you said - “There is always a time for everything.”

The process of conception being a struggle these days, the very basic thing that any patient longs for, is for her to have a stress free relationship with her doctor during consultations and procedures. You have never failed us in this aspect. Your way of handling your patients to keep them in a comfort zone by patiently explaining the procedures, clearing doubts and addressing fears at each and every step and being available for any urgency gives a personal touch - just what we need. With Dr. Sapna, even painful procedures can be undergone in an almost painless way. 

We are half way through our journey to becoming parents. Thank you so much Dr. Sapna, we are so happy to be associated with you in this journey and look forward to experiencing one of the best moments in our life with you in the coming months. 

Thanks loads,
Janani and Siddharth

review:
We would like to recommend Dr. Sapna Lulla, for anyone seeking Gynecologist or Maternity care hospital in Bangalore for normal delivery.
 
We would like to thank Dr. Sapna Lulla, We met her at when my wife was at 7th month. At our very first visit doctor said, “Now it’s not only your baby, as you choose me as your doctor, along with you both, now it’s my baby also. We all three will take this journey towards normal delivery with a healthy baby” and that made us feel we have made a right choice and decision on changing the doctor in between. And she also gave us lots of emotional support during treatment process. Doctor guidance and patience to wait for pain to start normally and early intervention helped us in having a normal delivery with a healthy baby as she said. 

People need to have patience when they visiting doctors, sometimes we may have to wait little long hours, sometime appointment may get cancelled due to emergency cases. Most of the time doctors work continuous shift.  

Thanks a million Dr. Sapna Lulla for all your support and care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Initially we (my wife and I) were in two minds whether to choose a reputed hospital or a reknowned doctor, for gynec, pregnancy consultation and delivery. After all the research, reviews and opinions, we decided that the right doctor will help us go a long way through. That was when we heard of Dr. Sapna Lulla. I’m generally a person who doesn’t believe in people casting opinions on social media on gynec consultation and delivery. After talking to many patients and doctors, we banked on Dr. Sapna! I would say for any doctor /patient - the trust factor is very crucial. This was mutual in this case! Like all would-be-parents desire, we too wanted a normal delivery instead of cesarean. And that was a long shot though! 
Dr. Sapna’s calmness and experience played a pivotal role. The patience-level and the rapport built over a period of time was magnificent. Her skill of assessing the patient’s body condition and the art of following a particular process impressed us a great deal. 
Her service and experience at the time of delivery made us feel on top! Thanks to Dr. Sapna for keeping up her promise of a normal delivery and we are happy parents now! 
I would certainly recommend Dr. Sapna Lulla to anyone who’s wanting to consult for gynec consultation, pregnancy and delivery.
All the best to the ones seeking help from Dr. Sapna! I’m sure you would end up being delighted - like we are.

My wife consulted Dr. Sapna N Lulla in Motherhood, HRBR for her pregnancy.  Dr. Sapna has been a blessing in our life. She has helped my wife to deliver a healthy baby in 2 hours of labour. She made sure that it was normal delivery and that our baby was a term baby. During 35 weeks the water level went low and baby movements were less, but she resolved it through medications making sure that the baby crossed 37 weeks and that the baby was not Preterm. We are very thankful to her for this effort she has taken. She is very dedicated to her profession and a very strong woman. She is thoughtful, caring, knowledgeable and all time smiling, approachable and friendly doctor. She helped my wife, to set a confident mindset throughout her pregnancy journey. 

Motherhood hospital provided good facilities. The staffs always greet us with a smile. We are thankful to God for giving us this experience with a good hospital and an excellent doctor. I would sincerely recommend everyone to consult Dr. Sapna N Lulla for any gynecological problems. *** ** *** **** *** I am sure she is soon going to be awarded for her dedication! Thank you Dr. Sapna.

tags: None
review:
Dr. Sapna is more of a mentor and a friend to her patients than a doctor. A damn Fibroid is what brought us to Dr. Sapna followed by a fortunate pregnancy. The journey between April’2017 to January’2018 has been a truly memorable one and thanks to Dr. Sapna who has made it possible. Her timely advise and “Pep-Talks” has not just made my wife be physically fit during her pregnancy period but she supported her to be prepared even more psychologically. Despite of having a fibroid, the doctor was always confident about a normal delivery. All her efforts did lead to a “Normal Deliver” (yes, you read it right) of a beautiful princess on 16.01.2018. She is a person of high integrity who has always kept the convenience of her patient on priority even more than her own. 

Thanks to the hospital staff at Motherhood too, who were working equally hard to complement the efforts of Dr. Sapna in offering a positive customer experience, in the true sense of the term.

We agree that there are numerous qualified doctors in the city who are great at their job, but we highly recommend Dr. Sapna to any would-be mothers who are looking for a “Friend” in their “Doctors”. You will never be disappointed when she is around!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Hi,
Me and my wife owe a lot for the services provided by Dr Sapna Lulla. I will explain our experience in the following lines for the benefit of expecting parents. 
My wife started experiencing preterm labour at 30 weeks. My wife was admitted for 2 days and the Doctor was successful in stopping the preterm delivery. My wife was under medication (including complete bed rest) advised by Dr Sapna Lulla. Later at 36 weeks 5 days my wife delivered a healthy baby boy at Motherhood Hospital HRBR layout. On top of all, the delivery was a normal one  even though our previous child is born through C-Section delivery.  Doctor reached the hospital in very short notice even at 3:15 am. I could see from the window of hospital waiting area that Doctor was rushing out of her car and running to the delivery room. We appreciate the "patient first" approach of the doctor. 
We appreciate the duty doctors/supporting/nursing staff of the hospital for their support and friendly care. 
Finally we thank Dr Sapna Lulla for  helping us to have a healthy baby!!!

tags: None
review:
This is when we were expecting our second child. I was referred to Dr Sapna Lulla by my doctor as she was retiring. It was 3 months to go before my delivery and I was very apprehensive in changing my doctor at such an advanced stage of the pregnancy. 

I still remember my first visit to Dr Sapna coz I was talking about it with my husband for a long time. She patiently went through the notes of my previous doctor to understand the issues I had faced and the care I had been provided. She called my earlier doctor to discuss my case and in a way seek permission to take my case forward. She did a thorough check up on me to understand my current situation.

Ever since that day, right through the remainder of the pregnancy, during and post the delivery Dr Sapna has been there right through, the care she displayed was very comforting for me. I delivered 4 weeks before my due date and had to call her in emergency. She was at the hospital within a very short period of time to initiate the C-section.

In addition to Dr Sapna, the staff at Ovum Hospital were very caring and good. A much better experience than what I had at the hospital where I went for my first babys delivery. 

Dr Sapna is a very caring and professional doctor.  I have recommended her to quite a few of my friends who are expecting and would continue to do so in future as well.

Thank You Doctor.

In labor room during pain when I saw her I knew that now everything will be fine. My baby boy is 5 months old now and finally I m able to write feedback for her which I always wanted to but was not sure whether my words will be able to explain her.. on my delivery day my husband had heard her talking on phn to sumone that she had kept the dinner for her daughter on the table and she rushed to hospital for emergency delivery. I can never be enough thankful to her for what she gave me but mam and her family will always be in my prayers..I felt so connected to her that even today when I go to cloudnine hospital for my baby's vaccination , just her glimpse makes me so happy..She has raised the standards so high that I don't knw I will be satisfied so much with any other dr. in future or not..I wish I cud consult her only for all my health problems in future,😉😛. There cannot be a more dedicated nd trustworthy doctor dan her. Also thankful to dr.bhavna who helped sapna mam during my delivery...

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
First of all a big Thanks to Dr Sapna and the team for very well taking care of my wife right from the Day one of the pregnancy until the delivery.  
The team OVUM is really amazing.
I met Dr Sapna through one of my colleague and decide to consult her only for my wife pregnancy-to-delivery journey. The Dr Sapna is really a very well experienced doctor and also very cool and calm. The amount of patience and listening to the patient for every (silly) cause is very high & clarifies the same without any hesitation. Hats off to her patience levels. 

The way she look at the patience concerns is really different unlike others. 
She tries to treat her patience with minimum medication and maximum care. She never let go her smiley what ever is the situation and time. That's the beauty of the doctor.

She will ask to go thought most of the standard tests to know the health of the baby and mother at every step. Her cool interaction makes every patient relax & Comfortable. When the months passes and closing to the 34th week, she gave her number to reach her any time (24 hrs) without any hesitation which gives you so much confidence. 

All you need to do is follow her instruction in a timely manner. That's it. At 38th week we met doctor as a routine check up. She found out water breakage and she took a decision & asked to admit in hospital. That day She was in the hospital till 12:30 AM in midnight and monitored and again called up duty Doctor and checked the same at 4 AM early in the morning. Nothing improved so she decided to take C Cut and finally we got a health boy. She discharged in just 2 days of time.  Both baby and mother doing well. Once again Thanks to Dr Sapna. 

I recommend her strongly if anybody wants a good and positive treatment. *** ** * ****** ******** energetic, enthusiastic and positive person and a lot of positive energy.  Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited her 1st time 15 days back n she saw me for 5 mins n she didn’t seem patient enough to answer any questions n seemed to be in a hurry. She asked me to use a tablet n then told me tat she’ll give a diet plan during d next visit. I was not satisfied bcoz of d hurrying behaviour. Frankly I went back bcoz she told me she’ll give me diet plan tats easy to make n blends with my regular food habits. Yesterday I had video consultation n it felt d same way again. She didn’t explain me much abt my problem n didn’t give much instructions. Bcoz of discomfort with her persona even I forgot to ask some important questions. So soon after video call ended I called reception n asked them if I can speak to doctor n I’ve  some doubts. They said they’ll connect in sometime few times n made me wait for hours. I thought ok d doctor is busy n let me talk tomorrow.same thing today n they didn’t even send me prescription yet. I asked them to refund me n it’s fair bcoz I didn’t even get a prescription. They said it’s not possible. Receptionist tried to convince me to talk to dr. I said I’m not comfortable now pls refund. Then she said “I swear on my daughter tat I won’t tell any of this to dr”. * **** ** ***** **** ** ******* ** ** ***** *** **** ***** ****** She said I’m being abusive n stuff n didn’t let me explain n then dr kept calling n she said d same n again didn’t listen. I asked for refund n she denied. Then I said ok let me ask some doubts. She answered them to get rid of me. Then I asked her for diet plan n she said it’s only part of diet counselling. I was shocked. Even yesterday she asked me to send Wat all I ate for 3 days full list. I was asking her y she told me first time n she denied saying tat. Then I asked her y she asked me to send d list n didn’t even let me ask tat. She said I was traumatising her n was asking her staff to record again n again. I started speaking loudly bcoz she’s not letting me ask abt it n then I ended it. I ended up crying. I was made to feel bad, ******* * ************ **** ** ***** ***** ****** * ** *** **** ******* Dr absolutely don’t have any emotional connect n she clearly doesn’t care to explain or show a lil care. **** *** *** ***** *** **** ***** *** **** ** ** ** ****

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I write this review in immense anguish and despair. I consulted the doctor upon a friend's recommendation. Towards the end of my 6th month of pregnancy, I had signs of a preterm delivery. She had my cervical length checked at Silver line diagnostic centre and the reports were normal. She also suggested to get a second opinion by getting a scan at Sparsh, Infantry road ***** ****** *** ******** ****** ** ** **** ** ** ***** *** * ***** ********** ** * ******* ******** *** *** ** **** **** *** ******** * ****** After two weeks of bed rest, she suggested that I take a scan at Silver line where the report showed a cervical length of 44mm. She immediately concluded that everything was normal and I could go about resuming my normal activities without suspecting the report. Within the next 5 days, I had entered labour and was asked to rush to Sparsh hospital Infantry road, a good 8 km away while I had earlier preferred a hospital closeby. I delivered a baby boy through C section the next day. And to add to my ordeal, the baby was shifted to a NICU at sparsh Yeshwanthpur **** ***** *** * **** ******** ********* ** * ******** ******* ******* * ******** ***** *** ***** ** ******Having undergone a C section I was made to travel 35km everyday to visit my new born. And when I requested her to shift the baby to a hospital nearby as I found travelling extremely painful, she responded rudely and accused me of being impulsive and had become very judgemental of my character. She wouldn't even give me a chance to explain myself ***** ** ****** ********** ** * ********** * **** **** ********* *********** *** ****** ** ****** *** ******** ** **** **** ** *** ******* ******** ** ** ****** *** *** *** ******** *** ** ******** ****** ********* ********* **** **** ** **** **** ********** *** ***** **** *** ****** **** ****** **** *** ****** ** ** ***** ********* 
And what was more depressing than that is that she made me travel in pain for such long distances to visit my baby when she knew that the whole point of visiting her was that her clinic was close to my house and that she would suggest a hospital that was closeby.
I strongly DO NOT recommend this doctor to anyone.***** * ******** ******* *** *** ******* ** ****** **** *** ***** ********* * ****** ******* **** ** *********** ******** ** ***********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
There are no words to describe how grateful we are for everything you have done for us. Dr. Sapna Lulla is a phenomenal doctor. She takes more time to listen to her patients, she is thorough, intelligent and welcomes patients questions with thorough answers, her ability to field questions shows how well trained and smart she is. 
 Being halfway through this pregnancy already seems so amazing and we feel blessed through this amazing journey because of you and your care.
"Giving birth is never easy and hearing from a doctor that your little nugget isn't so little may cause expectant mothers more anxiety"... Now here the difficult journey started when my baby was detected with Macrosomia and then Dr. Sapna sinked with the situation and helped us to come out of it with her efforts which were out of the box... Apart from being amazed by her professionalism and excellence as a doctor, I am in awe of the way she handled our whole situation, always calm, always speaking to us with all the truth even when it ws scary, always taking my phone calls and text messages, she did not see day or night but connected with us and helped to overcome the macrosomia as she helped in checking my sugars...
Dr. Sapna is a complete personality in herself... I truly believe that your expertise, passion for your job and willingness to be flexible are what brought us to what we are today... Lastly,before saying you are an extraordinary doctor, I want to tell you that you are an extraordinary human being...
A big Thanx to you....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr.Sapna is very friendly and makes you feel comfortable with every visit. She explains everything and does not hurry up even though she is a busy doctor. I got to know about her through one of my friends. I visited her during my 7th month and since then she has guided me and supported me in all aspects. She told me that I can deliver normally and suggested me to do all the exercises by visiting a physiotherapist. She also suggested to do all house hold cores as it would help me deliver normally. 

However I ended up in an emergency c section after 10 to 12 hours of labour as my baby's heartbeat started reducing. But the doctor was trying all ways possible till then for a normal delivery and even suggested epidural as I was not able to bear the pain towards the end and I had dilated only about 3 to 4 cm. I though kind of feel that she was not informed about my labour status properly by the hospital staff . But anyways I guess it was God's decision to make me deliver via c section as Dr.Sapna told me that the umbilical cord was very short and a normal delivery would have complicated things even more.

I would like to thank her for all the effort she took. Would highly recommend her 👍.

PS: She is little busy most of the time as she works hard 24/7 for her patients. So it's better you keep direct contact with her via phone call or message rather than depending on hospital staff to inform her about your status during delivery time or any other emergency situation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Bad experience ever with such an experienced doctor!!
The first time we visited the Dr Sapna health care clinic for my wife’s UTI, we booked an appointment for 4 pm on a weekday. The doctor came at 7pm which is fine as she had an emergency at the hospital but the staff didn’t even called us to inform the same. We had to wait for another doctor as we had office. The junior doctor saw the urine test as well as the urine culture but did not mention in the prescription about the culture we already did. Basis the normal urine test she prescribed antibiotics which were given through IV and my wife went to the hospital for next 3 days to complete the medication. She did not get any benefit of it, so we went for a follow up consultation to the doctor. She said to do a urine culture as the result of the previous one we did was not mentioned there. We showed the urine culture to her and she said it does not say anything about the resistivity of the bacteria so we will have to do it again. Had she told us about the report during our visit my wife wouldn’t have gone through the IV procedure. When we confronted the doctor about the same she dismissed us very rudely and told to do the test. We did the urine culture from her own lab which she suggested and the result came negative. So we showed it to doctor she just said its normal nothing else

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
None
review: I consulted Dr Sapna  when I was 7.5 weeks pregnant (ectopic pregnancy). My previous doctor was not able to diagnose my issue till 7 weeks since I had no symptoms of ectopic pregnancy. On my first appointment (10:15pm, last appointment for her, that day) she took time and heard all my previous health  history and spoke very softly, then immediately she herself scanned as radiologist already left hospital and expressed a doubt of ectopic. She gave her number and asked me to call her for any emergency in the night and get a scan done in the next morning. On the next morning within no time I had to go for laparoscopy as it was confirmed. I was into tears and she gave me great moral support like my family member. From then onwards,I used to regularly consult her for pregnancy as I had PCOS as well. She never put me on induction or medication and asked us to try naturally and I was not confident getting pregnant naturally with one tube and PCOS , but may be because of her positive attitude, the way she treated me and by God's grace I conceived after 8-9 months after surgery. Now I'm 14 weeks pregnant. I really thank Dr Sapna for all her support and I am sure that I am in safe hands.

tags: None
review: My wife delivered our first baby at Ovum hospitals on 4th May 2017. It was such a great journey having a healthy baby boy. I would like to thank the entire team of Ovum for helping us to have our baby safely in our hands since the pregnancy had little complications at the end. At this moment i wish to thank Dr. Sapna Lulla who was our consultant gynec whose guidance and care helped us a lot. We started consulting Dr.Sapna just by seeing some reviews as we were very new to Bangalore. But our experience proved that all the reviews we had read about her are 100% true. She is such a super good doctor and a very down to earth person. She used to explain all the details about the pregnancy in very simple way so that we can understand it easily. She used to listen even our very silly concerns and give suggestions. She never asked us to do any unnecessary scanning during the entire course of our consultation. During the delivery time it was her quick and smart decision helped our little one to come to our hands in normal way without any difficulties. I would like to express my sincere gratitude from the bottom of my heart to Dr.Sapna and her entire team who had taken care of my wife and baby throughout pregnancy and after delivery. May God bless Dr.Sapna and her family.

tags: None
review:
Dr. Sapna is the one name i can blindly trust for pregnancy realted consultation. Being a husband i was very much worried about my wife's delivery. But i find myself very lucky that we met Dr. Sapna. We first consulted the doctor even before my wife concieved. In first meet only i felt as if we are her family, with her never ending smile she explained every thing about our family planning and then from day one of my wife's pregnancy she was always there for us every moment. 

 In today's business minded world we were lucky to get a doctor like her. She will answer every silly questions that every one has specially during first pregnancy. In every monthly/weekly consultation she guided us with her valuable tips. Even being so busy, she always had time for our queries. She proactively guided my wife about do's and dont's for normal delivery. Her first and foremost intention is to go for normal delivery. Although my wife went under c-section delivery bcoz of some complication, she tried her best for normal delivery. 

I would like to sincerely thank you Mam for being so supportive and guiding us to our parental life with a beautiful angel. God bless you with long life and good health.

tags: None
review:
I (Debjani) and my husband would like to big thank you to Dr. Sapna Lulla that we had a cute little baby on 6th Feb 2018 in motherhood hrbr layout branch. 

I had a miscarriage on July 2016 in kolkata and we came to bangalore on January 2017 as my husband got transferred. After coming to bangalore we did some googling about good gynecologist and decided to consult her. 

At the first visit itself we were very satisfied with her approach. We both have few complications however she motivated and guided us every steps. She would never force you with any decision but will always guide you with a detailed explanation which helps a lot in taking meaningful decisions.

At 6th month of pregnancy I had gestational diabetes. Everyday night after 2 hrs dinner and early morning I was suggested to check sugar level and informed her over the phone. She picked the phone 11 pm and 6 am. This is just one instance. Whenever I called her she picked up the phone and if she was not available at that time, always ringed back to me. 

She always encouraged us for normal delivery. After 39th week I did not feel any labor pain. We got admitted on 39th week 4 days and she started induced labor in the afternoon on that day. Finally next evening baby delivered normally. 

The Motherhood's hospital sisters were very friendly and took care me and baby every single moment of the stay. 

Thank you again Dr. Sapna, thanks for the miracle. You are a magician :)

tags: None
review:
Consulting  Dr Sapna during my pregnancy was the one the best decisions that I made for myself and for babies .
I was carrying twins and there was lot of risk and complications involved .
Dr sapna guided us well right from the start . She made sure scans were done at right time and proper medications were taken to make sure that both babies were born healthy . She has a lot of experience and can foresee problems much in advance which helps in timely treatment . 
Her commitment level is excellent.  she is available 24/7 not only on call but also at hospital if needed . There were instances when I had to contact her late night and she was available to see me at hospital even at odd hours .
i was admitted to hospital for a week before delivery due to urinary infection and being at high risk of preterm delivery.I was kept under constant observation and it  was totally worth it . Inspite of delivering at 33 weeks , I delivered healthy babies and it was all
Possible because of the efforts of Dr sapna . She had made sure that I was taking proper diet and gave enough medications  to make sure that I could deliver healthy babies even if preterm happens .
She is a very good person and always welcomes each patient with a smiling face. 
*** **** *** ****** *********** ****** ** **** * ***** *** **** ******** * 
Thanks Dr Super Sapna . You are truly a super woman .

tags: None
review:
This is the first pregnancy for my wife and we have visited Dr. Sapna in the 3rd month, after getting few recommendations from my couple of cousins and also after going through the reviews in Practo.

We were really happy and got motivated on our very first visit. Doctor was really friendly and she explains everything in a very brief manner. All the questions in our mind were answered by her, with we even asking.

There were few complications during 6th month of pregnancy and Dr. Sapna suggested all the possible ways to avoid miscarriage or Pre term delivery. She had taken all the necessary precautions to enhance the baby growth and avoid any complications. I can say that she is very confident and reasonable in her decisions and also she guides the patients in every aspect and boost up the confidence in the patients.

Right from the day we consulted her, she insisted only on normal delivery. She has suggested best exercises and great thing is she even follows  up with patients about the exercises. Even on the day of delivery when my wife startd feeling labor pains, she called in person in the midnight and enquired about the situation.  We were really happy with the personal touch and care.
I am really excited and happy to say that my wife delivered a baby gal and it was a normal delivery.

review: i had a terrible experience with the doctor. i was having really bad vaginal infection and she asked me to get blood, urine and vaginal swab tested. all reports were normal but i was suffering a lot. so on my 2nd visit I expressed my concern that the reports are not in sync with my actual condition, to which she replied quote rudely, what can I do if your reports are normal; you can get tests done elsewhere if you don't trust our lab; you can consult another doctor of you are not happy with my diagnosis and treatment. so I left the hospital never to visit this doctor again.

She's strict whenever required and also humble when there is concern. She is always good to her patients. Never recommends unnecessary test and the comfort level she gives to her patients is awesome.  I think that's what every pregnant lady looks in her doctor. Her ********* ** **** ***** *** *** confidence and attitude towards her work is awesome. 
I would recommend her to all the women whom I know.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I know Dr.sapna when she was in ovum hospitals ,I consulted her for my first pregnancy and delivery.the only person whom I could trust and depend on completely was her ,she is just a call away and amazing person with patience and a loving  smile always on her face .So for my second delivery also I wanted to consult her ,but then she was in motherhood so I changed the hospital just to get treated by her and I delivered my second one there ,.I highly recommend Dr .sapna for every pregnancy related problems and deliveries .Now she owns her own clinic which is more comfortable .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited doctor sapna with a history of miscarriages and from the day 1 of our visit she was determined to make this pregnency succesful.I had cervical stitch placed at 12 weeks and was restricted to bed rest.Doctor Sapna was very confident of doing normal delivery since the very first visit and her words assured me to take decision to deliver in bangalore and not leave to native place for delivery.I finally gave birth to my daughter on january 11th at 1 am and it was normal delivery. Doctor Sapna was absolutely very active and readily available even though my labor was in midnight and she assured my family members too not to take stress and tension during my labor.My sincere thanks and humble gratitude to doctor sapna.I definitely will recommend her to all who are looking for a fair and transparent communicating doctor who does normal deliveries.

review:

I was not not able to push in the end but she gave her best.  She is an Angel me and my daughter, so is for many other mothers. I would recommend her for anyone anytime.

tags: None
review:
I started to feel this piece  of solid mass within my stomach / abdomen. Post ignoring it for a few months, it started paining and that is when I visited Dr Sapna again. 
She did a thorough check up, got a scan done immediately which was inconclusive. she asked me to under go an MRI post which it was confirm that a fibroid / cyst, somewhat the size of a orange was growing within me. It had enveloped my right ovary. 
Dr Sapna explained my options and stated that a small operation was required., explained possible repercussions in future. she asked me to get the operation done within a month. I did within 3 weeks. The cyst was a 11.5 x 9.5 cm solid mass(somewhat like a coconut). Within 2 days I was back home and within 1 week back to almost normal. Dr Sapna & team were once again brilliant in their care towards me and would recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I thank dr Sapna madam fo being so considerate to an elderly couple.she explained the issue so many times again and again to make us understand the need for surgery.she did hysterectomy for my wife and helped in her postoperative recovery.she was very supportive to understand our problem and was more like a daughter when our children are in us.she took care of us like a family member and even communicated to our children in us on online consultation.may god bless you dr and your family in this pandemic to be a true child to many elderly couples like me.i would recommend dr Sapna for all gynaecOlogy surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
It's been 4 months since my delivery and I do not have enough words to say how grateful I am for all the care and advice given by Dr. Sapna. This was my second pregnancy and I came to Dr. Sapna after going through a bad recovery phase post my first pregnancy. She took pains to assuage all my fears and was very friendly,  open and honest about what to expect and how to proceed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:

She is the epitome of Positivity. With every consultation, you return feeling more confident and faith restored knowing you're in safe hands.

tags: None
review:
It was our first pregnancy and it was a great experience delivering with Dr Sapna at Ovum Hospital. She was constantly on the watch for Sugar and Thyroid levels.My wife was hypothyroid before pregnancy and doctor took sufficient care to make sure that the TSH levels were under control. After completion of 38 weeks, my wife started having rock like abdomen hardness with no pain. Dr Sapna from her experience, suggested that this could be because of the dose of thyroid medication my wife has been taking. She had the baby's heartbeat monitored for a 20 min period after which she recommended a C-Section as the baby seems to have breathing issues. We agreed to the C-Section and it turned out that her decision was very timely as the baby was cramping for room and the placenta had started wearing off. 

Thanks to Dr Sapna for her timely decision making and care. We owe you a lot !

Thanks,
Aswin

tags: None
review: She is a perfect combination of beauty with brains with dedication and commitment.she perfectly made the diagnosis of ectopic pregnancy which was missed by our primary gynaecologist .she got the scan and beta HCg done confirmed and documented her diagnosis within 2 hrs.she also then gave us an option to go back to our primary consultant and not speaking anything wrong or bad about the miss of diagnosis by her.my family truly admire red her professionalism her confidence *** *********.we were well explained about the anaesthesia and laparoscopic surgery .very well organised and quick surgery by the team dr Sapna her colleague dr sailesh and anaesthetist dr Anuradha .(all the while she said it is team work dr sailesh dr Anuradha me and my sisters and ground staff) .********* ******  **** **** ********* *** thank you the entire team .would highly recommend the doctor and her team.

tags: None
review: It was one of our great decision to consult Dr.Sapna for the lower abdomen pain. In the diagnosis it's was identified that both of my ovaries had endometriosis cyst.  Initially we were tensed as we are planning for a baby and was not sure about having a surgery.Doctor gave us much needed confidence for the removal of the cyst with the help of a surgery as she made us understand that the cyst is a little too big to be reduced with injection.She is a very patient person who explains in detail about the procedures and that it is completely safe.The surgery went good without any complications.The experience post surgery with the nurses and other staffs were also quiet good.We will surely recommend her for others because we have felt that she is a very dedicated person who takes good care of her patients

She is very accomodative and will lend a ear to any query you have.. My surgery went well and I'd like to thank her and her team of doctors and nurses for it. I'd definitely recommend her for any gynecological problem.. From minor to major issues, she's most likely able to handle them all..

review:
Dr. Sapna Lulla has been stellar for us. From our experience, the below qualities make her an excellent Doctor.

1) Professional - The very first time we met her, we had the feeling we met the right doctor. She appeared confident and importantly gave us a sense of assurance
2) Relationship - Dr Sapna believes in building a relationship with her patients. This goes a long way considering that both the doctor and patient will spend about 8 months leading to the D-Day
3) Transparent - Dr. Sapna will give you all the necessary information and more if you require it. So, you will have a sense of what you are going through, what you are required to do and why


A personal note:

Dear Dr. Sapna,

My wife and I thank you for all that you have done for us over the 8 months we spent with you. Especially thank you for taking excellent care of my wife at the hospital and making sure we get the kind of experience we were looking for. May God bless you, and your patients through you.

review: Dr Sapna Lulla is a pioneer in her field. No comparison her dedication and honesty towards her work stands her different from any other consultant.it was very comfortable to take my mother and wife to her .she communicated to both generations in their language and to their understanding ability.My mother from village was very comfortable with her attitude and humble behaviour and felt no dr had treated her giving so much information.my wife city born felt she’s ****** ************* *** informative to minute details making her comfortable in privacy and friendliness.i definitely recommend her for all female wellness issues.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
We consulted Dr. Sapna Lulla for pregnancy check up for entire 9 months. We were thoroughly guided by her and she took utmost care of the mother and the baby throughout the duration. We are blessed with a baby boy and we’ll always be thankful to ma’am. She is one of the most polite and knowledgeable doctor in the city. She knows her patients well and ensures to make the journey  easy for all the would be parents. She nurtures all the would be mothers like a mother herself and takes care of them like her kids. She is a delight to meet and consult. We strongly recommend Dr. Sapna. All the would be parents are advised to consult her for their pregnancy journey. Thank you ma’am for everything. 🙏🏻🙏🏻😊😊
Regards,
Jyoti & Dhiraj

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
GREAT EXPERIENCE
My since gratitude and appreciation to Dr sapna for her constant support in helping me through my toughest pregnancy .
After i lost my first babby of 30 weeks. After that i consulted doctor sapna mam. I had to go through some critical procedures also.she explained calmly in detail everything peacefully and veryy friendly... She is available all the time on phone. 
She boosted confidence and ensured everything will be normal.  And THANK YOU SAPNA MAM iam a mother of 2 children now. I recommended many of my friends...and even they are happy with the experience with sapna mam.
Her patience and dedication towards her patients and profession is commendable. I reccomend her strongly.
Thank you doctor for blessing in disguise and an advocate of god in bringing our bundle of joys to the world...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Sapna is one of a kind. A genuine doctor with "patient first" attitude. My wife and i consulted her for my wife's pregnancy and throughout the whole duration, Dr was supportive, provided all information to us and put us at ease at every step. Her confidence in her craft as a Doctor and step by step approach to treatment was what we liked and helped us along our journey. Even the care that we got during delivery and post natal is something we will always remember and be grateful for. We strongly recommend this Doctor to anyone who is expecting. She is a gem of a Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Sapna has been god sent for us. she took utmost care of me and gave individual attention during my term. Even in times of covid, she was accessible at all hours and on non consultation days too.she goes beyond the call of duty as a doctor to ensure well being of her patients and thoroughly explains each step as you progress in your pregnancy. she encouraged me for a natural delivery and suggested various exercises and remedies to ease my discomfort. even being a high risk pregnancy, I could enjoy the full term and with her guidance was able to recover soon after delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My experience with Dr. Sapna Lulla is very pleasant. From dayone she had been patient and answered all my queries. Always explained the stituation  and position of my baby and taken care of me and baby really well. Had always replied and answered my calls on watsapp whenever i needed.
Really encouraged and supported me for normal delivery but due to emergency had c-section and deleivered baby boy. Thank you so much Sapna mam. I am really greatful for all your support during this precious journey of pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: It’s been a decade and I longed for a baby.many drs I visited who did tests repeatedly read files and checked numbers on reports .iui and ivf I did all and I stood in between nowhere.inhappened to hear about her at someone’s baby shower and found five couples pregnant with her and decided to meet her.i went to her on Saturday she said I am busy may not be able to give all the attention meet me on a weekday.or a Sunday .she treated us well filled us with hope and positivity and planned our treatment carefully.she is very frank and informs things upfront.l am expecting my bundle of joy within a months time and all through with a natural conception.i truly recommend dr Sapna for her effort to treat every pt as a human and plan their conception and pregnancy very meticulously.should mention her coordinator is very supportive and professional.waiting to be delivered by you.a hand next to god thank you dr once again.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Thank you madam for my son.in this lock down period every time I look at my son I remember your support and care in the 9 months and the delivery day.thank you mam dr Sapna for my life’s precious gift.you have been like a mother to me in all these months.one request to people who write about her please remember madam is blunt and straight she will not be bad to patient.if you can’t afford she will tell alternatives but not back to money.dont misguide patients by writing wrong about good dr.madam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,Lower Segment Caesarean Section (LSCS),
review:
We visited Dr. Sapna Lulla for both our Children. For the first one, we had to go to our hometown for delivery after consulting her for almost 8 months of the pregnancy and she willingly supported our decision and was encouraging us to do the needful to ensure that the parents/family are not offended. Which i felt was very rare to these days.

She has the ability to convey the message across in an effective way, without scaring the patients. Very positive and  willing to take a calculated risk for the patients. 

Thank you Dr for your dedication for the patients. Really appreciate your attention to the details through your busy schedule. God bless you.

-Preetham R and Meleena

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dear Dr Sapna Lulla

I and my family will be eternally grateful to you for the service that you offered at this time of helplessness. I wanted to personally write this immediately after the delivery but since I got the opportunity today so I hereby thanking you for taking up my pregnancy and gifting us this wonderful child and lot of happiness. Many many thanks doctor no body does this kind of help for in acquaintance. You are no less than a guarding angel for our family. I once again thank you from the bottom of my heart.

Thanks and Regards 
Manjula Deepak

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have had the best experience one can ever expect during uncertain times during the COVID 19 lockdown n pandemic. Our baby was born in July 2020 and the days leading to the delivery were very stressful and with lot of uncertainty. Dr Sapna Lulla was very humble and caring during such time.

My C section was scheduled immediately and all went very well as planned. The staff / team were very kind and helpful, clean and hygienic place and best care taken. I got discharged after 4 days from the hospital, soon after I felt better. Recovering now and with absolutely no complaints.

Dr Sapna Lulla is a very experienced doctor, She knows the best and she has given us some great advise. She gives great confidence and comfort whilst you discuss your concerns with her. She has a lot of patience and never hurry things up. 

Myself and my family members are very happy and we pray great success for her ...blessed to have her in my life.

Thanks 🙏

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: ** ***** ** * ************* ************* ** **********we consulted dr .sapna during end of pregnancy at 33 weeks with breech due to low afi (4.4) and baby weight 1.78 kg .we were told by our regular gynaecologist we may need c section immediately which is a preterm delivery.Dr.sapna mam guided us well and increased the afi level and pushed preterm to 37 weeks .once my wife reached 37 weeks afi level 7-8 and baby weight 2.52 kg .she did serial scans and suggested to push one more week to see if baby changes position .she said if afi increases we can try manual rotation of baby but it did not increase movements of baby reduced and took call to a csection asap..she gave all options to us keeping us well informed.we chose dr Sapna mam as she knows all history and put a lot of efforts.we delivered baby girl 2.72 kg under mam guidance no nicu admission and cost reduced for us.dr Sapna mam is amazing and thank you so much mam🙏🙏🙏🙏.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),
review: I am a staff nurse and I started meeting dr Sapna for my brothers wife after seeing her treat a lot of patients  at ovum hospital in Kammanahalli.over a period so many of the staff who had no children got pregnant after being treated by mam .To make it short if you are looking for a doctor who does not write unnecessary investigations who counsels and fills you with positive thoughts ,who loves to get people pregnant and deliver them normally then dr.sapna is the right choice.I delivered my nephew with her at cloud nine hospital in hrbr.A dedicated two years and a beautiful baby conceived naturally with her with minimum medications.Humble request dr.start delivering at hospitals like ovum also where all class of people can take advantage of your services.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Nearly a year back, I was referred to Dr. Sapna Lulla with hopes of experiencing the amazing journey of pregnancy and eventually having a family. From our very first meeting, my wife and I both sensed an ease with Dr. Sapna's approach, she was very methodical in every step and explained the reasons on every decision to be made. Even after every hurdle we encountered, she held our hands taking every step of the way, and gave us confidence and the best advices. 

Our home is finally filled with more joy and laughter since the birth of our child on 6th April 2020. The delivery of my son went smoothly even with this ongoing COVID19 situation and lockdown.

The only words that comes to our mind to describe Dr.Sapna Lulla's exceptional care, would be her genuine kindness, trustworthy, passionate, and most importantly, our guardian angel.

All in all a very good journey worth remembering with you mam at cloud nine HRBR Bangalore.. 

A Big Thank You from Ayon Bhadra & Monalisa Roy.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Would strongly recommend dr sapna lulla.. 
Of course this is a bit late for me to post a review, after 3 months of delivery, bt remembering much later after delivery shows speciality abt her.. I Had complicated pregnancy, bt with the ease n courage she took my pregnancy till an end was wonderful. She recommended me for a normal delivery though I was not sure I wud. I was amazed that she remembers what she had told me in our last visits. Can call her directly wen necessary. Thaks a lot doctor for ur great support..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Following are the quality which any patient is looking in doctor.
1. Attentive to give full time during consultion
2. Proactive to suggest any upcoming threat
3. Available in emergency
4. Understand each patient seperately
5. All around care for baby and mother.
Believe me, Dr Sapna has all of above. We have around 6-7 months of treatment with her. We had total of 4 emergency and complicated situation where she performed very well to safeguard my kids and wife. 
In summary, Dr Sapna is the one whom you are looking for.
I have gone through the tough phase and recommending her based on my personal experience.***** ****** ** *** ***** ** *** ******* ** *** ******* ** ****** * * ** ********* ** *********************

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
This was my first pregnancy and my cousin refered me to doctor Sapna Lulla. It was a very smooth n amazing journey with my pregnancy just because of doctor Sapna and her way of boosting our confidence. I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes and doctor made sure that we take precautious measures about it so that I get a normal delivery and it worked well. Thank you very much doctor.

Always had her support and also answered our silliest doubts without any hindrance. Always got her response for our messages on sugar level readings and guidance at any time, day or night.
She was always available for us because of which we were so confident.

Had a baby boy normal delivery. Doctor is very straight forward and transparent about the treatment that we go through and explains everything in detail before itself. Very happy to refer anyone to Dr. Sapna Lulla.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Being a first time mom comes with it's own set of challenges. I had so many doubts and questions racing through my mind even when I first got pregnant, Dr Sapna answered every one of my questions with absolutely no hesitation and without any judgement. 

My delivery was slightly complicated and I had to go for an emergency c section. But, I went in confidently solely due the the confidence I had in my doctor. 

I also had a little anxiety after delivery, but the doctor held my hand through my whole recovery and was very responsive so I didn't feel alone and could make a full recovery.

I would completely recommend doctor Sapna to anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Sapna has been treating me for more than 3 months for my First pregnancy. I had an early pregnancy complications but for Dr. Sapna care and treatment we couldn't have continued our joyful journey. Just listen to her advice, follow the same you will definitely reap the benefits. I have visited other gynaecologist too but I felt she was experienced in her field and and she always prefers/ suggests natural diet. I definitely suggest her for anyone who is expecting a new born and I personally have seen her doing complicated delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Special thanks to Dr. Sapna, her smile itself gives us positive vibes,my pregnancy journey started with motherhood and ended in cloudnine, that is only because of Dr. Sapna. I had wonderful time during my 9 months, she never told us to do any unnecessary test or scan, she is the one doctor who explain each and every things like why particular test needed and what is the scan report status.

I am so happy that I choose her as my gynaecologist who helped me for NVD and I am blessed with baby on 24 dec.

God should bless her with all happiness.

In Bangalore if anyone is preferring for normal delivery ,without any hesitant consult her, I can tell that you will be in safer hands.
 
Once again thanks a lot to Dr. Sapna.

review:
*** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ************* * **** **** ***** Right from the first day when I visited her for my pregnancy... till the time I delivered.. and then post delivery... she has advised us with the best possible medical supervision.
