tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am Deepa Sunder, been married since 5yrs. We have consulted so many doctors for the baby but nobody analyzed the problem. I had visited Dr.Sapna lulla at motherhood last year Dec and got conceived on feb 2018. She identified the problem within that stipulated time and she made me to conceive naturally with her medication without any further delay. My delivery was normal I had followed all her instructions for the normal delivery. I gave birth to a cute healthy baby on Nov 4th 2018 at Cloud Nine . No doctor will care you this much she is so friendly and caring. I strongly recommend her for all the needy couples like us.
Regards
Deepa Sunder

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
We first met her at Motherhood and we were  happy, the way she explained the procedure and  routine we need to follow, as it was our first baby.

Later, we were very much impressed and continued to follow her and get her advise, treatment, scans, regular checkups done under her supervision, though she moved to cloudnine.

We were actually amazed by the transparency she deals with the pateints, which has reduced in other hospitals nowadays.

Thanks to her for this Noble service.

Also the cloudnine hospital charges a reasonable price for consultation.

We strongly recommend others to visit her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
My wife was a patient of the doctor from the beginning of her pregnancy. Doctor gave  her proper guildlines about  what to do and what not to. One of the thing about the doctor I like most is she never wrote extra medicine since my wife condition was normal from beginning and she has shared her personal number with us so that we can call her in case of any emergency. She was very friendly with my wife and if my wife have any problem, doctor handles it very efficiently and in a very friendly way.
At the time of labour pain also, she was very supportive and she tried and made the delivery normal. For a moment It looks like my wife has to go for C section, but doctor waited for the normal delivery and she made it. Thanks to Sapna Lulla for treating my wife in a really well manner.
I would suggest everyone just go for the doctor , *** ** *** ***** Once Again thanks to Sapna Lulla.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Had two miscarriages and was very upset with things.When I gained the confidence to get pregnant again,I needed someone who can help and guide me the best from the beginning and be with me in my special days.Was looking for a doctor with positive energy which radiates and fulfills my dreams. I have searched for good doctors and changed hospitals ,but was never satisfied,then I met Dr Sapna Lula who impressed me in first visit.She listens to us with so much patience and make us comfortable by her smile ,then suggest what our health situation demands.Am in 5th month now and journey has been wonderful with her support.Am sure it will be Great in coming days as well..
Thanks Dr for all the support..God bless you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: If there is one thing I consider myself lucky for is that I chose doctor sapna for my delivery . She was the third doctor I went to for consultation( due to various reasons of hospital change etc). She is probably the most professional , passionate and warm doctor I have ever seen in my life .  I had a high risk case ; she was super supportive and helped me cope with the worry in addition to the medical inputs . She never acted scared herself and ensured that I had a normal delivery . No other doctor would have the confidence to take such a call . I can never thank her enough for being there for me !  Don’t think even for a second before taking her as your Gynae. She is exceptional !!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We decided to consult Dr.Sapna after reading reviews on Practo and we are very glad we decided to consult her.She handled my pregnancy and delivery really well.At every appt she welcomes you with a smiling face however exhausted she is.She is extremely patient and answers all your queries very clearly. She makes you very comfortable that you can clarify all your doubts without hesitation.She tries for all her patients to have a normal delivery and advises on practices that can make you have a natural labour.We are blessed with a son now and we are grateful to Dr.Sapna for taking ur through this journey so beautifully.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Very much satisfied with Dr. Sapna Lulla. From the beginning, we were undergoing multiple complications .Half knowledge and the influence of online medias were giving us lots of tensions .All these times we felt she is very much approachable . We were getting right guidance and support all the time. She never hesitated to answer our queries even at late nights. Many times we really got surprised thinking how she  maintains her cool and energy even after a daylong hectic schedule. Once again thanks a lot for your care and support madam .Wishing all the success throughout your career.

Viju & Priyanka

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would strongly recommend Dr Sapna. We consulted her for our first pregnancy and were so happy with her that we decided to stick to her inspite of staying 15kms far. She was no less than a caring mother 😄😀😀. She always had time for our questions whether during visits or off duty hours. Her positivity made our whole experience enjoyable and stress free. We delivered a healthy and beautiful baby girl last week and are sure will be consulting her for our next pregnancy as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We have been consulting Dr. Sapna Lulla from day one of our pregnancy and she has been excellent in her approach since start. We heard about other doctors of top hospitals inclined towards C-section for profitability of their hospital. After meeting Dr. Sapna, we understood that it is not the hospital that matters but a reliable and trust-worthy doctor who you would need for your pregnancy. Dr. Sapna was the only one we can recommend for this as she can convert a complex pregnancy (like ours, fibroid risk) to a normal delivery with ease. 
We trusted the doctor blindly as this is our first pregnancy and she has delivered more than our expectation. Would strongly recommend this doctor for any one who is looking out for the best doctor for your pregnancy. Her positive attitude would inspire you for a safe pregnancy.
Thank you Doctor, God bless you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I took treatment with Dr Sapna Lulla when my friend recommended her, I visited her asking for a relief from fibroid uterus and severe pain abdomen due to a diagnosed cyst in ovary.what I liked the best about her she patiently went through all records and informed me all about surgery including complications associated with surgery .she also informed us regarding the need for urologist standby if injury to ureter/and post hysterectomy hrt/and also regarding postoperative recovery period (which was not discussed by the two other drs I consulted).Not only was my surgery remarkably free of complications I became symptom free .My recovery period was comfortable and dr answered all my phone calls and explained everything in detail.I definitely recommend dr Sapna for surgery for fibroids.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
This was my 1st pregnancy and we started consulting Dr. Sapna from the day first. We didn't know much about doctor and hospital in bangalore, chooses her on the basis of rating and review over Internet. She is very nice as a person and doctor. She suggested us what to do and don't during 9 month tenure. We follow all her instructions for normal delivery and finally we blessed with our little bundle of joy. my baby girl was delivered through normal vaginal delivery. Because of her only we came to Motherhood HRBR . Thanks a lot to Dr Sapna and team for normal delivery. 
I would recommend all to visit her if  planning for a baby.
Thanks a lot mam. best wishes from all of us :) .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I came to know about Dr. Sapna Maam from my neighbors and decided to consult with her. From the day one we started consulting till the baby got delivered it was very good  experience. We had  few issues earlier and considering that Maam regularly suggested tests on time and medication and everything went fine. Maam is very friendly and takes care of patient like family member. Also for us we had doubt about normal or C-section delivery and Maam was very positive and it was normal delivery. We are very grateful to you for your help and thanks to motherhood hospital for all the support.  I would like to suggest others to consult with Dr. Sapna Maam for pregnancy related. Thank you again Sapna Maam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We went to Dr. Sapna for consultation after first trimester of pregnancy.  On the very first day she gave us a comprehensive prescription- complete list of Dos and Don’ts. By the end, we realised that we did not have any query or confusion to get her inputs on :)

It was her constant assurance, timely intervention and guidance that helped me enjoy my pregnancy. The suggestions on exercises are very conventional and can be included in your day. 

She is very patient, thorough, affectionate and empathetic- all that you will need in the labor room
Another remarkable trait is that she remembers her patients, their plans and challenges. Similarly, she knows her staff and their strengths well. All this ensures that her advices are based on the complete picture. 
Certainly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: A heartfelt thanks to Dr. Sapna for sailing us through our pregnancy journey. A true professional to the core and yet so amicable, Dr Sapna explains every issue to the required detail. Her step by step approach helped me focus on my current state of pregnancy instead of anticipating future outcomes. She suggested antenatal classes which helped me remain fit throughout pregnancy. She doesn't prescribe unnecessary medication or scans, and truly cares for her patient. A big thumbs up for her ***** *** attitude towards her profession.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

We owe you our thanks.

Thank you for doing everything that you do and helping us during the complicated pregnancy.

God bless you doctor and your phenominal service.

Preetham & Revathi

tags: Wait time,
review: It was my first visit with Dr. Sapna. She is calm and patiencely listen my problem. I missed my period since months, negative pregnancy tests. As we are planning for baby,i told her my issue so she recommended medicine for bleeding n write some of the tests to do on my second day of my period,but I m confused bcoz she didn't tell why my period has stopped what's the reason behind it. She did not tell me .i think after see my report only she can say. Let's hope for the best. No doubt hospital n staffs are nice. ..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
It was an okay kind of experience. I felt very disappointed when she did not listen to my problems. She checked my blood reports and mentioned everything is normal. 
But I was feeling headache tired vomiting etc.. she was not ready to listen . She told its psychology of pregnancy. I was shocked to hear. Im not a person who has psychological effect. Especially im unaware what happens in pregnancy.
Also I had to wait a lot to meet the doctor, even though i had prior appointment.
Since its my first pregnancy i expect the doctor to make me understand my problems and solutions instead of ignoring.

tags: None

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Hiiiiii am Mrs.Bhagu......             A ray of hope is what I will call her dr Sapna Lulla.today I have a baby after three years and that also twins delivered normally by drsapnalulla two maths ago .just by talking to her voice on phone(mind you at 3am early hrs) she judged she's not comfortable.the cervical  stitch put in Andhra had given way and my wife was bleeding .                all the way from krpuram to hrbr layout to Motherhood she kept talking on the phone giving us confidence.in 20 mts she arranged her neonatal team dr suresh dr Deepa dr Santosh and dr murthy to attend on my preterm                                                      Babies.every time I hold my little ones I can't forget the way dr delivered my second twin whose legs came out first .thank u dr Sapna for making my life beautiful.god bless u please keep smiling always and keep spreading the smile to many a desperate mother.thank u all Drs and Motherhood hospital

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: From the very first meeting, we liked the doctor's friendly approach and her style of explaining. Her commitment towards mothers to be is extremely sincere and one cannot but help feel very comfortable with her. I did face a few hitches during my pregnancy but she made me sail through them confidently, blowing all my fears away. I had a pre-term labour (in the 35th week) and Dr Sapna was with me throughout and made sure that I delivered a normal healthy baby without much complications. Confidence is not a strong point for a first time mother like me and Dr Sapna helped me tremendously by answering all my queries however trivial they might have been.

She will take the right decisions at the right time which is very important.
You can consult her without any hesitation and from the first appointment itself you will feel that you are with the safe hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Caesarean Section (C Section),Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
I belongs from CGHS, after our near by hoapital is moved out from CGHS, we find Aster CMI next to us, there we visited Dr. Sapna Lulla for our pregnancy case (after going through reviews). Usually hospital and Sr. Doctor little hesitate to attend CGHS patient, but Dr Sapna  being Sr Doctor, never let us feel that. For her we are a patient like all others.
On 36th weeks we had a littile complication regarding Amniotic Fluid index, it was going down side, which results less growth of baby in womb.  She admited my wife and tried to improve level, but it was further going down, ultimately decided to go for Caesarean Section. For our first baby (Caesarean Section only), cut was done vertically, causes problem during this time. Thanks to her, she did it nicely, and it's 7 days to our baby. Both baby n my wife are fine n healthy.

During our admission Dr was on line with duty doctor at night 1:30 and morning 4:30 too, it shows how much she is involved with her patient.

During OPD visit, we may wait for 15-30min mostly or some time more (if more receptionist will inform over the phone in morning itself). This wait is not because she is late, actually in between she will go to OT and runningly come back. 

Hats off to her* * **** **** *** ** *** *****
reply_text: Thank you so much for your appreciation and understanding.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hiii am Gayathri.....   
I visited for my PCOD problems and pregnancy.... 
        
I am grateful to God that he showed me this great and hearty genuine Dr. Sapna Lula...... 

Doctor was a great support during my PCOD treatment. After the PCOD treatment I was conceived with a child however I had a miscarriage. During that. That time the doctor took good care of me and helped me overcome my depression. She always talks and encourages me to be positive.

Then I was conceived with my daughter , She took great care and initiative to help me with the treatment for the child until the delivery. She always wanted me to have a normal child birth. Due to complications she helped with the C-Section. She was very upset more than me that I couldn't give birth normally. Because my baby passed  meconium in last stage . 

During the surgery, the baby was moving upwards and she ensured that the baby and the mother are safe and sound. Dr. Sapna was more than a mother to me. I can never forget the support and help. I am greatful for all that she has done for me and my baby .i don't have words to tell you thanks doctor.*** *** *** **** ******* ******..... 😍😍😍😍😍  from my hearty I recommend Dr. Sapna .......

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I write this note of appreciation on behalf of my wife and myself. We are grateful to Dr Sapna for all the help, guidance and care she provided to us during the course of pregnancy. She managed to push the delivery date by two weeks more than the usual thereby helping babies gain weight. Our babies were delivered safely and are doing fine.Would like to reiterate what many others have said earlier - Dr Sapna Ma’am is gem of a doctor, a through professional with a assuring smile and genuine care for patients.Would like to highlight two things that, we believe, deserve special mention. First, high standards that she has set for her entire team, not only at Sapna Health Care but also at extended hospitals. Second, despite her busy schedule, she is available at any time. In case of emergency, she told us to call her immediately irrespective of the hour and also gave us the back-up mobile numbers. At one point when we were going through a critical phase, she called us late in the evening around 11:30 pm and again next morning around 8:00 am to check the things. This was very reassuring.If you are consulting with Sapna Ma’am, we can say with sincerity and utmost confidence that you are in safe hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would strongly recommend Dr. Sapna to all the ladies who seek consultation during the beautiful phase of pregnancy.😊😊😊😊I had the fantastic experience while visiting her for my routine checkups. The best thing about her is that she always has    suggested me to opt for natural sources of nutrition(fruits,veggies etc) rather than relying on supplements.In addition,she has always motivated me towards normal delivery and being physically active throughout pregnancy especially in 3rd trimester.By God's grace and routine followups,i was doing well without any single health issue ( i was regular to my office as well till 8th month🤗) and was quite excited for normal delivery.umfortunately,normal delivery couldnt happen coz of last minute complication and i delivered baby boy via cesarean mode.I was quite depressed post surgery for which she gave sufficient time to make me feel better and move out if it (blaming to destiny)Well,i still visit her for post surgery concerns I appreciate dr sapna for her support and guidance during all my visits.once again,a big thanks to Dr. Sapna!!!🙏👍😊-Regards,Preeti Avasthi

review:

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife(Poorna)has twins pregnancy. Doctor said that it is high risk pregnancy. and should be careful. We went to Ovum at the time of 7th month and consulted Dr. Sapna Lulla for the first time. She treated and explained all the things very well. She gave her personnel number and told us to call even midnight also if there is any emergency. In 8th ending(last Sunday) my wife developed an emergency situation. Delivery pains started for her. I could not understand what to do, because we met Dr. Sapna only once and the Hospital where we used to consult is too far. Finally I called Dr Spana and told her the situation. She remembered my wife name and asked to come to Ovum hospital directly. By the time we reached hospital she came to hospital(Even though it is Sunday) and she made arrangements for emergency care. She did cesarean surgery. Post surgery NICU care also is excellent at Ovum. Now both babies are doing fine in NICU. She responded on time(Even though it was Sunday) and took care of my wife and babies. Otherwise situation would have entirely been different and can't imagine. that. How can we express our gratitude to Dr, Spana except saying big Thanks to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: She delivered my baby boy in motherhood hospital. However she is very stingy, time wise.  So please don't expect her to be a friendly doctor. She is not your friendly gynaec. I wanted to seek her help and clarification for planning my second one given the Covid unforeseen circumstances. I even was okay taking the appointment. I called her and she asked me to message her incase of anything. But she seemed very impolite even while responding on whatsapp.I was okay to even book appointment and she blocked me on whatsapp. Please tell me which doctor would do that? She has her own clinic or hospital now, I understand doctors are all busy and overworked during Covid but please don't respond if you are not free or in a good mood. But don't respond and block a person who is seeking help from you. If practo wants to check the facts, I have the screenshot where she has blocked my number. Though she was very strict or whatever, I wanted her to be my gynaec for my second baby too because of my own sentiments. But this is not how you treat a person who is anxious to get some clarification from you.  Please please please don't do that to a pregnant woman or woman who are trying to conceive. Motherhood should be an empowering experience and should not be made to feel small by the doctors. It's not how it should be.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
First of all, a big thank you to Dr Sapna in ensuring the baby and mother is safe. This was our first pregnancy and everything was new. There were multiple complications we faced from 4th to 6th month and Dr advice has helped gain our baby girl’s weight through this time. We anticipated a premature birth and it happened so by 6.5 weeks early. We as parents to be were obviously worried and Dr did the best to push through to 34th week from 30th even with complications. Our baby is a week old now and yes, she need more care through the first 5-8 weeks, but she is safe.

Dr was available at almost all times when we reached out to her, unless she had any prior appointments. One thing I/we learnt through the pregnancy is, every small thing matter to us and we try to get double checked if all is well with doctor. That’s quite normal and human tendency. At the same time, if Dr is unavailable, we should also understand, there is someone else she is attending to, who need urgent attention.

She tried to push for a normal delivery all through, but, she transparently conveyed when it could possibly endanger the delivery process and we had to chose otherwise.

Thank you again Doctor and wish you all the very best in bringing a whole next generation of babies every single day!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We consulted with Dr. Sapna from identification to the 32nd week of pregnancy. We initially went to Ovum just for her based on reviews, and followed her to Motherhood when we got to know she had moved.

She suggested just the tests and scans that were needed. My wife had a fever around week 10, she handled it well by comforting my panicked wife first, administering periodic paracetamol drips and monitoring, keeping the night duty doctor completely informed about the case so he could handle in case we come back to the hospital for an emergency. Her control over the situation and transparency in communicating the plan gave us a lot of confidence. We had to plan the delivery in a different city for personal reasons. She gave a good handoff note for the next doctor to take things up. ***** ** *** **** ******* ** *** **** in terms of being approachable, showing diligence / care for the patient(like reviewing reports over whatsapp to reduce commute for followups, etc.) and integrity. 

Now our child is over a month old and is doing good. We are very thankful to Dr. Sapna for the great care she offered throughout.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I consulted Dr.  Sapna during my pregnancy. She is very friendly Doctor. She observed me keenly during my consultation. She always made me comfortable no matter what were my problems/questions. She gave me required medication with required diet and exercise. She always encouraged me to have normal delivery. 

As I am from Pune,  I was planning to do delivery in Pune. With Doctor's help and support, I always wanted to do delivery under her observation. For my travel, she suggested to travel after 36 weeks as I could not travel before 28 weeks due to my job.  

When I came for final checkup before my date,  she told us that baby might come out very soon which was very shocking for us as we were not prepared for it. But doctor assured us that things will be OK and we will be able to travel  if there are no other problems. But she was sure that baby will come soon before my travel. 

On same day,  I started having cramps. When I called doctor,  she asked us to come immediately to the hospital. She made sure that everything is ready when I reach there.  When I reached,  she literally ran to labour room to handle my case.  There was no lady relative with me,  she stood with me like a mother and handled my delivery very well. By God’s grace, I had normal delivery.

I would like to thank Dr. Sapna for her support and care. I recommend her for anybody who is looking for a good obstetrician.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I decided to consult Dr. Sapna only after reading many reviews in practo which is worth enough and I had made the right decision. From the first visit, our consultation was satisfactory and we gained confidence in each visit thereafter. The good thing which I personally noticed is her way of approach, explanation given to the couples and the care she places in front of you about your health. Whether it may be a normal or a complicated issue some doctors lack in the way it has to be explained but she is worth it! Even when she moved to a different hospital we didn't change our track. She tried her best to postpone the delivery date till 39th to 40th week, but unfortunately had to go for C-section sighting the complication of early pregnancy. From the time we consulted her till the delivery and even after that, she had given us the confidence of being in safe hands. We are finally blessed with a baby girl under the supervision of Dr. Sapna and her team by C-section. Cutting it short, I would give thumbs up to this lady and I would recommend everyone.

Last but not the least, Thank you so much Doctor for all your support and guidance.

tags: None
review: After the very first visit to her my wife and I were absolutely sure that Dr.Sapna would be the doctor delivering our baby. We even decided to stay back and not travel to Hyderabad, where both our families reside for the delivery The nine months of pregnancy went by with no problems and as my wife was diabetic it was extra important to maintain the diet. tags: None
review: I was 5 months pregnant when I came down to bangalore for my delivery. After researching a lot, I decided to meet Dr Sapna based on the glowing reviews she had. After meeting her I was knew that the reviews definitely do justice to her work. It was a huge relief to know that her work practice had similar values that I was looking for. She ensured that I could enjoy my pregnancy and delivery in a positive, relaxed manner while ensuring the good health of me and my baby. Delayed cord clamping, immediate skin-to-skin contact for mother and baby, bare minimum medicines and supplements, pushing for natural healthy food intake and exercises all are reasons why I would recommend her to all pregnant women. Another plus is she takes the time to listen to you and explains everything clearly without inducing fear in any way. Thanks to her, I had a very happy healthy  pregnancy and had a healthy baby, and a healthy post natal life as well.

I would strongly recommend Dr. Sapna for Gynaecology and would like to thank her for the commendable efforts and the warmth via which she handed over my first baby to my wife.

review:
I had consulted Sapna for my pregnancy. It was a very memorable experience with the doctor. Right from day 1, she was very patient in answering my queries. The medications she prescribed was very minimal and nothing was unnecessary. The course of the period before delivery was smooth for me and without any hiccups. 
At the time of delivery, her aim was always to deliver the child in a normal way. I was admitted at night to the hospital (motherhood hrbr) and she tracked my hourly progress through the phone. When it was time for delivery she reached on time and helped in delivery within an hour, thanks also to the support staff at motherhood. 
Overall it was a very nice experience for me and recommend Sapna to anyone looking for a good obstretician.

tags: None
review:
We visited the hospital for my wife pregnancy. It was a great experience throughout the pregnancy. We have a baby girl now through normal delivery, thanks to Dr Sapna Lulla. 

During the delivery, our baby had meconium aspiration syndrome (MAS). Baby had passed the motion in the mother womb itself.

Although MAS is often not life-threatening, it can cause significant health complications for your newborn. And, if MAS is severe or untreated, it can be fatal.
In spite of these complications, our baby was born through Normal delivery and she is doing fine.
Many many thanks to Dr. Sapna Lulla. She explained me everything just before the delivery and then after taking my consent she went for Normal delivery. It was very smooth and baby is also fine and healthy.

Thanks to Nursing staffs also. They were very caring and helping throughout our stay.

I recommend Dr Sapna Lulla to everyone.

Most importantly she didn't put us in any tension and she always have easy solution for all the problems. She is very much dedicated to her work. Many of a times we saw her going late. tags: None
review:
Dr. Sapna is an absolute professional, she knows her subject very well and guides you along the right path. I have a known condition of PCOD for over 10 years, I have been to other doctors and done multiple tests and taken a lot of medications along the way. When I first met Dr. Sapna, she first made me do tests and put me on a set of medications. After a review after a few months, she realised that, that particular line of medication was just not working for me. 
Also, we have been trying to get pregnant for the past one year, so started doubting if there are possible fertility issues. We voiced these concerns to Dr. Spana and after she decided to do a test to evaluate my hormones. Once the test was done, she suggested a laparoscopic ovarian drilling...she informed us that this line of treatment is required for me to get better and is going to help in the long term. 
The procedure was done by Dr. Sapna and Dr. Srisailesh, they found that I had a polyp and a block in my fallopian tube which they removed. The procedure was an absolute success and the attention provided by both the doctors were excellent. 
I have absolute faith in Dr. Sapna that she's going to help me in my journey to overcome PCOS and help us get pregnant. 
I would recommend Dr. Sapna to anyone looking for a doctor who is not only gync but also has in-dept knowledge with fertility issues as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am really thrilled to write a review for my gynecologist "Dr. SAPNA LULLA", *** ** *** ****** In the Era where all doctors are trying to earn more , she focuses on what's best for her patient. I went to her specifically to have a normal delivery and despite the cord being around my baby's neck she made it happen. She's an expert at complicated delivery. She's very thoughtful and ensures that her patients are not spending a lot on unnecessary visits or medicines. I went to her just 2 weeks before my delivery as I had an issue with the gynecologist I was seeing at Ovum. And she made me feel like I was consulting her all through. We need to have more doctors like her and we'll end up developing trust in doctors. She displayed awesome team management skills in the labor room 
Her team was well equipped, courteous and emphatic. We went to motherhood just for her and it was totally worth it. Thank you motherhood for hiring her, her patients will come back to your hospital just for her.

Our first consultancy happened in 7th month of pregnancy where she(dr Sapna lulla) advised for certain procedural precautions..and exercises to lead our way to normal dilivery.

At this point of time seeing to the age and other situational concerns normal dilivery seems to be tuff.

Finally the day came and inspite of certain complication DR Sapna did tried and got my wife to deliver the baby through normal  proceedure.

We are much thankful to Dr Sapna not only for taking care of my wife but also diliver with smile atitute.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was recommended to Dr.sapna by my friend .*** ** *** ** *** **** ******** 
She never recommends any unnecessary tests or medicine and also she is so calm and patient all the time you ask her all concerns,thats very appreciative.throughout my pregnancy ,the treatment was very satisfying and I was very happy.she was just a call away till my 40th week and the day of delivery I was so relaxed though I had extreme contractions and pain just because she was standing next to me.she is an amazing soul.ever smiling and always approachable post delivery.* *** *** **** ********* ***** *** *I had to travel 60 kms  each time I visit,still I never thought to change , she is so dedicated and I had a wonderful experience with her. She tries her best to try for normal delivery till the last min,and only recommends c section in extreme situations and make you fit for normal delivery from day 1 of pregnancy and that's the best part.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted my wife Anuradha to Dr Sapna when she was at her 6 weeks of pregnancy. She is very pleasant and alaways greeted with smile. She never got irritated, no matter how busy she is. She alaways listened the problems very carefully and cleared all the doubts. She alaways responded to phone calls and answered the queries. During the 3rd month of pregnancy my wife developed Hypertension and hyperthyroidism but she taken care of everything very well in time. My wife's delivery was very difficult due to Hypertension and it was an emergency C -section but entire night she was there with my wife,she alaways keep calm and ensured everything is fine. She is very friendly and alaways kept us tension free, no matter how big is the problem..
Thank you Dr Sapna, thank you for everything...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
We  tried  for quit a while but it was  a long wait while most of our friends family and doctors always  advocated for IVF ..confidence is greater than perception, DR Sapna always gave me courage that natural  conception is always possible regardless of duration of trial and at what age. After few consultation  we had natural conception through  her ,she was great to help us through all the trimester with ease,, this was a great achievement for both of us and thank GOD Dr Sapna Lulla  guided as through till our son was born ,without  regret  I will recommend her and GOD willing, she will handle our second child ,From Kenya  we'll be back and I will always have gratitude,hope , respect and blessings  to her...Her  
friendliness  and humility to  patients is always of motherly nature     
   thank you Dr Sapna  we will come back and my friends will come from Africa as well.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had a normal delivery in spite of my first being a ceaserean  in spite  of my baby  having passed motions in my womb.I had high blood pressure and diabetes  in my 8 th month and a 3.3 kg baby weight.thank you dr.for always being there.she helped me emotionally post delivery and took care of me in the labour room for 3 hrs as my husband was in Delhi  and I was all alone.Today I am glad and thankful the airlines did not allow me to travel.it was possible to deliver normally as it was. Drsapna lulla.thank you dr.keep doing the service to society .Dr please colour your hair ,give yourself some personal time.(That’s my drs dedication and comittment.)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went to her for second opinion in my second pregnancy.I had a short cervix she explained and advised cervical encirclage.I went to another dr she said no stitch within 72 hrs I had a spontaneous miscarriage.I felt bad that I did not listen to her.In my third pregnancy I went back to her and she put a stitch at 30 weeks  I had bleeding and was diagnosed with bleeding in placenta.my baby was not putting weight she counselled me kept me in hospital spoke to aster management and arranged a bed for us for two weeks .it was an emergency delivery for my baby at 2 am dr.came and saved me and my child.today I have this joy because of dr,sapna.Thank you thank you till infinity.
reply_text: Happy to be a part of your journey, thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We consulted Dr. Sapna on recommendation from a relative. Doctor is very calm and always ready to answer our questions, though  interaction would be less because of covid , she explains everything as it is and the measures we will take to ensure things go smooth. Timely intervention ensures things to be taken care beforehand. 
Doctor tries for Normal Delivery and suggests proper diet and exercises for the same, I followed every point religiously and had a Normal delivery with a healthy baby girl.
Also thanks to Dr. Priya who was very helpful during the final weeks of Pregnancy and took care of all things during labour.

From the beginning doctor is so friendly, down to earth person.she gives her personal number to call her at emergency. She explained clearly what she is doing.. she takes extra care for her patients.. it's worth for the money.. the clinic also week maintained.

My wife delivered a baby girl in north Bangalore hospital on 2dec 2020.. we chose this hospital because it's near by..  doctor came to hospital at 3AM and it was a normal delivery.
Thanks to her and we recommend doctor Sapna for maternity...

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I met dr Sapna (aunty though she does not look 40 plus)for irregular periods but what I liked about her is she made me so comfortable and reassured me that this is a process of growing up due to harmonal changes and lifestyle.she educated my mom and aunt to sit across table and spend some time with growing children and talk on good and bad touch .she also spoke to them to explain to boys at home to respect women.all in all a visit to a gynaecologist helped Us as a family to sort out many issues.a dr with a social bearing,do visit her for any female related or counselling related issues.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: When I learnt that my first pregnancy turned out to be ectopic ,I was devastated.The only person whom we could think of was dr .Sapna Lulla.Considering the criticality of my case during the burning issue of covid  19 pandemic ,Sapna ma’am was super responsive and supportive.She immideately called us to her clinic,briefed us about my condition,the necessary action,gave us a ray of hope about our future and without any delay rushed me to the hospital.l was in the ot  within 20 minutes and ma’am successfully performed my laparoscopic surgery,saving my life at the right time and preventing a fatality.I was back home the next day with madams advise,my recovery has been going pretty well..We thank Sapna ma’am from the bottom of our hearts for being my life saviour and assuring that I would be able to conceive soon.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
We consulted Dr Sapna by reading reviews online and we think this was the best decision we made and she helped us in our 1st pregnancy..You need a Doctor like her who perfectly gives you what is right for you and will lead you to fruitful results ..we blindly trusted her advise on medications, tests , exercise during pregnancy, diet etc and it was worth it.
It’s because of her our new born is in front of us..we totally recommend her for pregnancy related advise and treatment..she is very patient and you will motivated after meeting her ..she encourages you to be confident during your pregnancy.

We are still consulting her post child birth ! She is too good !

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Maternal Care/ Checkup,Pregnancy with PCOD,Fertility Treatment,
review: Doctor Sapna lulla is the reason behind our happiness... I chose Dr.  Sapna as last option after multiple attempts of getting treated with other doctors to conceive.  I regret for not choosing Dr.  Sapna to be my first point of contact when I was trying to conceive.  I visited Dr.  Sapna in October she did few tests and gave me a perfect treatment.  I conceived right after a month..  Thank you for everything ma'am.  Her smile and the beautiful golden words of "All the best" made me stay positive all the time..  Thank you so much Dr.  Sapna ma'am.  You are the only reason to visit cloudnine.  Very happy to visit any hospital wherever you are.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I met Dr Sapna 2.5 years back for infertility issues. She provided me a good guidance including referring and coordinating with a well experienced infertility specialist. After conceiving twins, she gave a good care including asking me to visit very frequently to ensure there is no complications coming on the way. The highlight was no unnecessary precaution was taken. A complete comfort was given till delivery. She patiently clarified all our doubt irrespective of the topic including diet. I m thankful to god that we met her and we are now blessed with two cutie pies.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Visited Sapna @ cloud nine HRBR for twin pregnancy care. I must say if it was not for her we would not have 2 beautiful babies now. Ours was a high risk twin pregnancy from 5th month onwards. Dr Sapna made sure that she does not leave anything for a chance and always prepared us 2 steps ahead of any  eventualities. Her medical expertise and diagnosing the cause and planning treatment is unparalleled. She was accessible at any time of day/night during  for queries or treatment. We were lucky to have you as our doctor. A big thank-you and we will always remember you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Cervical Cerclage,
review: Dr Sapna has always been very friendly and supportive right from the time we met her. She has always guided us in the right direction when we were facing issue with conception. Once conceived, I was diagnosed with cervical insufficiency and had to undergo a surgical procedure for cervical encerclage to avoid late miscarriage. Dr Sapna ensured the entire procedure went smoothly. Being a high risk pregnancy she has monitored every minute detail related to the pregnancy and taken care of me till the date of delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We started our pre pregnancy consultation with Dr. Sapna and continued further consultation with her post conception. She was very friendly and practical in her approach right from the beginning. Doctor only advised those medications and scans which were genuinely required.  From the beginning the effort was for a normal delivery and all her treatment was focused towards the same. With her help and advise, our pregnancy was very comfortable. *** ** *** ** *** ****** ******* ** **** **** ****** *** we are very thankful to her for helping us bring our little one into this world.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The Doctor Mrs.Sapna Lulla is very kind and so friendly by giving advises and she clear all our doubts and gave hope for normal delivery. Due to Leakage problem immediately we rush to the hospital and immediately they advised to admit the mother and they tried their best to get normal delivery, unfortunately they end up with cesarean. 

I am fully satisfied with their treatment and hospitality for mother and baby. I 100% recommend the hospital as well as Dr. Sapna Lulla.

Regarding cost is bit high but need to compromise because of their treatment and services.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
We visited Dr. Sapna couple of years back. It was one of the wise decision we made after seeing many Docs. She treated us with minimum medicines and timely tests which were really necessary. She was just a call away for any queries at any point of time (there have been times where she was prompt to respond at odd times). From the day we met her to till date we just followed what she said *** ** ****** ********* *** *** 

Today we are blessed with our little bundle of joy.

I would suggest Dr. Sapna to all mommy to be and also to once’s who are wanting to be.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was consulting with Dr Sapna Lulla for my  first delivery.The overall approach and experience from day 1 to till the delivery we had very good support from her .During the delivery it was midnight still she picked the call without hesitation and she came to hospital immediately and done normal delivery though my kid has some complications.i would recommend this hospital to any one who wants to have hassle free experience.All the staffs are supportive and responds on time and they are very polite for answers all our queries .

As pregnancy  confirmed I am consulting Dr.Sapna Lulla at Motherhood hrbr. tags: Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Had to visit the hospital twice in the same day and we spent 5 hours in total, wherein the doctor spoke to us for 2 minutes. 
The Reception service at the Hospital is absolutely unprofessional, they are not organized and seems to be really relaxed in their attitude. I was unwell and was extremely dizzy, could not stand and as the receptionist forgot to give my name to the doctor, I had to wait for 2 hours.
Even the doctor was rushed and she seemed like she wanted to get rid of the patients as soon, her consultation was really rushed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I would first like to Thank Doctor Sapna for helping us through the entire process and made it smoothly sailing for us. She did her best till the very last and made sure to always keep us well informed of what was happening and making us feel comfortable every time we meet her and spoke to her. She is a very good doctor knows exactly what has to be done. Even with the amount of patients she meets daily she has time for all her patients and is very friendly. Motherhood HRBR layout is luck to have Dr Sapna as their Doctor. 

Thank You from 
Chantalle, Joel and Baby Luke.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The main reason for me to visit Motherhood Hospital,HRBR Layout was Dr.SAPNA.  At my first consultation itself, she instilled a lot of confidence and gave me an assurance that I was in safe hands. She would never over prescribe any medication and would stress on leading a normal life which inturn aid in having a normal delivery, And I DID! :)

When I was in labour room, she kept every nurse and supporting doctors on their toes which really helped the baby and me to come out all fine post delivery. I am very thankful to Dr.Sapna for a smooth and seamless pregnancy and delivery experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Like most others,we were looking at a lot of reviews before finalising on the Dr and was certainly not disappointed. One can see her patients come out of her room with a smile always.she's available round the clock and promptly answers queries through whatsapp and calls on emergencies.we infact moved to Motherhood which was a very new branch then because the Dr moved there.Overall our experience has been very satisfactory.

She is not a lady who will make you feel that pregnancy is a sickness, on the contrary she insists you to go for a walk, do squats , do household chores so that it keeps you active and helps in normal delivery.

Not going to write big reviews. In simple, if you want to enjoy your pre and post pregnancy, and for any sort of complications in your pre and post pregnancy, I strongly recommend Dr. Sapna Lulla should be your 1st choice. 

Thanks a tonne mam for all the support. We will never forget your name in our life time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We read all the given reviews about her and decided to consult. And now I can say that I have chosen exactly perfect person and she is Dr. Sapna Lulla. Dr.Sapna Lulla is a wonderful person and very friendliness. Right from the 1st week of my pregnancy going to her and now I am 29 weeks . She listen to the people nicely and gives the enligh time to explain all the concerns. I would be very much happy to recomend her to all my friends and family’s.

We were guided so well that inspire travelling to a distance of 30 kms we make sure we visit the doctor to get confidence and hope for our baby.

review: Hi I am prameela. I am consulting dr.sapna lulla for pregnancy. The doctor is like a goddess for us. We have a very good faith in her treatment and her dedication.  Words are not enough to explain her. All I can say is thank you very much . . . .doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Started visiting doctor during 4th month of second delivery. Had a lot of issues from multiple fibroids to underweight baby, BP... but at each visit doctor patiently explained the complications and precautions to be taken. Delivery time doctor was very positive and prompt. Recovery was also very fast and painless. Thanks doctor for helping us bring our daughter in this world.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
*** ** *** **** ***.She will not  give medicine blindly. She will try to treat with diet and excercise.  She treated my PCOD without medicine, in one month it became normal. The next month I became pregnant.

I have treated 2 years for PCOD with another doctor, and there was no change after taking hormone tablets. I thought there is no solution for PCOD. 

******** ** *** ** *** **** ***** ** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

review: Dr. N Sapna Lulla is one of the most sought after gynaecologists and we have had great experience whilst consulting with Dr. Sapna. Despite being so sought after we have never found it difficult to approach Dr.Sapna. We have enjoyed the experience from pre to post pregnancy and would recommend Dr.Sapna to anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I am Deepa Sunder, we consulted Dr. Sapna lulla for getting pregnant. we were married for about 5yrs, consulted so many doctors but they were unable to predict the problem. She is the one who found the issue and gave proper medication within a short span and i am 4 months pregnant now. we are immensely happy and satisfied with her approach and encouragement. I strongly recommend her for the needy couples like us. May god keep her hale and healthy forever.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It's great experience with Sapna mam...
From beginning of first month of pregnancy she took really a good care and approachable at any point of time. She's known for her tremendous friendly nature and down to earth. 
She guides and encourage for normal delivery as I have never heard of any doctor recommended. 
High patience level person and always welcomes patients in smiling face.
Overall great experience and complete satisfaction. Will recommend!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,
